337         /**
338          * Class constructor
339          * This will start a new document
340          *
341          * @param array   $pageSize  Array of 4 numbers, defining the bottom left and upper right corner of the page. first two are normally zero.
342          * @param boolean $isUnicode Whether text will be treated as Unicode or not.
343          * @param string  $fontcache The font cache folder
344          * @param string  $tmp       The temporary folder
345          */
346         function __construct($pageSize = [0, 0, 612, 792], $isUnicode = false, $fontcache = '', $tmp = '')
347         {
348             $this->isUnicode = $isUnicode;
349             $this->fontcache = rtrim($fontcache, DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR."/\\");
350             $this->tmp = ($tmp !== '' ? $tmp : sys_get_temp_dir());
351             $this->newDocument($pageSize);
352     
353             $this->compressionReady = function_exists('gzcompress');
354     
355             if (in_array('Windows-1252', mb_list_encodings())) {
356                 self::$targetEncoding = 'Windows-1252';
357             }
358     
359             // also initialize the font families that are known about already
360             $this->setFontFamily('init');
361         }
362     
363         /**
364          * Document object methods (internal use only)
365          *
366          * There is about one object method for each type of object in the pdf document
367          * Each function has the same call list ($id,$action,$options).
368          * $id = the object ID of the object, or what it is to be if it is being created
369          * $action = a string specifying the action to be performed, though ALL must support:
370          *           'new' - create the object with the id $id
371          *           'out' - produce the output for the pdf object
372          * $options = optional, a string or array containing the various parameters for the object
373          *
374          * These, in conjunction with the output function are the ONLY way for output to be produced
375          * within the pdf 'file'.
376          */
377     
378         /**
379          * Destination object, used to specify the location for the user to jump to, presently on opening
380          *
381          * @param $id
382          * @param $action
383          * @param string $options
384          * @return string|null
385          */
386         protected function o_destination($id, $action, $options = '')
387         {
388             switch ($action) {
389                 case 'new':
390                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'destination', 'info' => []];
391                     $tmp = '';
392                     switch ($options['type']) {
393                         case 'XYZ':
394                         /** @noinspection PhpMissingBreakStatementInspection */
395                         case 'FitR':
396                             $tmp = ' ' . $options['p3'] . $tmp;
397                         case 'FitH':
398                         case 'FitV':
399                         case 'FitBH':
400                         /** @noinspection PhpMissingBreakStatementInspection */
401                         case 'FitBV':
402                             $tmp = ' ' . $options['p1'] . ' ' . $options['p2'] . $tmp;
403                         case 'Fit':
404                         case 'FitB':
405                             $tmp = $options['type'] . $tmp;
406                             $this->objects[$id]['info']['string'] = $tmp;
407                             $this->objects[$id]['info']['page'] = $options['page'];
408                     }
409                     break;
410     
411                 case 'out':
412                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
413     
414                     $tmp = $o['info'];
415                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n" . '[' . $tmp['page'] . ' 0 R /' . $tmp['string'] . "]\nendobj";
416     
417                     return $res;
418             }
419     
420             return null;
421         }
422     
423         /**
424          * set the viewer preferences
425          *
426          * @param $id
427          * @param $action
428          * @param string|array $options
429          * @return string|null
430          */
431         protected function o_viewerPreferences($id, $action, $options = '')
432         {
433             switch ($action) {
434                 case 'new':
435                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'viewerPreferences', 'info' => []];
436                     break;
437     
438                 case 'add':
439                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
440     
441                     foreach ($options as $k => $v) {
442                         switch ($k) {
443                             // Boolean keys
444                             case 'HideToolbar':
445                             case 'HideMenubar':
446                             case 'HideWindowUI':
447                             case 'FitWindow':
448                             case 'CenterWindow':
449                             case 'DisplayDocTitle':
450                             case 'PickTrayByPDFSize':
451                                 $o['info'][$k] = (bool)$v;
452                                 break;
453     
454                             // Integer keys
455                             case 'NumCopies':
456                                 $o['info'][$k] = (int)$v;
457                                 break;
458     
459                             // Name keys
460                             case 'ViewArea':
461                             case 'ViewClip':
462                             case 'PrintClip':
463                             case 'PrintArea':
464                                 $o['info'][$k] = (string)$v;
465                                 break;
466     
467                             // Named with limited valid values
468                             case 'NonFullScreenPageMode':
469                                 if (!in_array($v, ['UseNone', 'UseOutlines', 'UseThumbs', 'UseOC'])) {
470                                     break;
471                                 }
472                                 $o['info'][$k] = $v;
473                                 break;
474     
475                             case 'Direction':
476                                 if (!in_array($v, ['L2R', 'R2L'])) {
477                                     break;
478                                 }
479                                 $o['info'][$k] = $v;
480                                 break;
481     
482                             case 'PrintScaling':
483                                 if (!in_array($v, ['None', 'AppDefault'])) {
484                                     break;
485                                 }
486                                 $o['info'][$k] = $v;
487                                 break;
488     
489                             case 'Duplex':
490                                 if (!in_array($v, ['None', 'AppDefault'])) {
491                                     break;
492                                 }
493                                 $o['info'][$k] = $v;
494                                 break;
495     
496                             // Integer array
497                             case 'PrintPageRange':
498                                 // Cast to integer array
499                                 foreach ($v as $vK => $vV) {
500                                     $v[$vK] = (int)$vV;
501                                 }
502                                 $o['info'][$k] = array_values($v);
503                                 break;
504                         }
505                     }
506                     break;
507     
508                 case 'out':
509                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
510                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< ";
511     
512                     foreach ($o['info'] as $k => $v) {
513                         if (is_string($v)) {
514                             $v = '/' . $v;
515                         } elseif (is_int($v)) {
516                             $v = (string) $v;
517                         } elseif (is_bool($v)) {
518                             $v = ($v ? 'true' : 'false');
519                         } elseif (is_array($v)) {
520                             $v = '[' . implode(' ', $v) . ']';
521                         }
522                         $res .= "\n/$k $v";
523                     }
524                     $res .= "\n>>\n";
525     
526                     return $res;
527             }
528     
529             return null;
530         }
531     
532         /**
533          * define the document catalog, the overall controller for the document
534          *
535          * @param $id
536          * @param $action
537          * @param string|array $options
538          * @return string|null
539          */
540         protected function o_catalog($id, $action, $options = '')
541         {
542             if ($action !== 'new') {
543                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
544             }
545     
546             switch ($action) {
547                 case 'new':
548                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'catalog', 'info' => []];
549                     $this->catalogId = $id;
550                     break;
551     
552                 case 'outlines':
553                 case 'pages':
554                 case 'openHere':
555                 case 'javascript':
556                     $o['info'][$action] = $options;
557                     break;
558     
559                 case 'viewerPreferences':
560                     if (!isset($o['info']['viewerPreferences'])) {
561                         $this->numObj++;
562                         $this->o_viewerPreferences($this->numObj, 'new');
563                         $o['info']['viewerPreferences'] = $this->numObj;
564                     }
565     
566                     $vp = $o['info']['viewerPreferences'];
567                     $this->o_viewerPreferences($vp, 'add', $options);
568     
569                     break;
570     
571                 case 'out':
572                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Catalog";
573     
574                     foreach ($o['info'] as $k => $v) {
575                         switch ($k) {
576                             case 'outlines':
577                                 $res .= "\n/Outlines $v 0 R";
578                                 break;
579     
580                             case 'pages':
581                                 $res .= "\n/Pages $v 0 R";
582                                 break;
583     
584                             case 'viewerPreferences':
585                                 $res .= "\n/ViewerPreferences $v 0 R";
586                                 break;
587     
588                             case 'openHere':
589                                 $res .= "\n/OpenAction $v 0 R";
590                                 break;
591     
592                             case 'javascript':
593                                 $res .= "\n/Names <</JavaScript $v 0 R>>";
594                                 break;
595                         }
596                     }
597     
598                     $res .= " >>\nendobj";
599     
600                     return $res;
601             }
602     
603             return null;
604         }
605     
606         /**
607          * object which is a parent to the pages in the document
608          *
609          * @param $id
610          * @param $action
611          * @param string $options
612          * @return string|null
613          */
614         protected function o_pages($id, $action, $options = '')
615         {
616             if ($action !== 'new') {
617                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
618             }
619     
620             switch ($action) {
621                 case 'new':
622                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'pages', 'info' => []];
623                     $this->o_catalog($this->catalogId, 'pages', $id);
624                     break;
625     
626                 case 'page':
627                     if (!is_array($options)) {
628                         // then it will just be the id of the new page
629                         $o['info']['pages'][] = $options;
630                     } else {
631                         // then it should be an array having 'id','rid','pos', where rid=the page to which this one will be placed relative
632                         // and pos is either 'before' or 'after', saying where this page will fit.
633                         if (isset($options['id']) && isset($options['rid']) && isset($options['pos'])) {
634                             $i = array_search($options['rid'], $o['info']['pages']);
635                             if (isset($o['info']['pages'][$i]) && $o['info']['pages'][$i] == $options['rid']) {
636     
637                                 // then there is a match
638                                 // make a space
639                                 switch ($options['pos']) {
640                                     case 'before':
641                                         $k = $i;
642                                         break;
643     
644                                     case 'after':
645                                         $k = $i + 1;
646                                         break;
647     
648                                     default:
649                                         $k = -1;
650                                         break;
651                                 }
652     
653                                 if ($k >= 0) {
654                                     for ($j = count($o['info']['pages']) - 1; $j >= $k; $j--) {
655                                         $o['info']['pages'][$j + 1] = $o['info']['pages'][$j];
656                                     }
657     
658                                     $o['info']['pages'][$k] = $options['id'];
659                                 }
660                             }
661                         }
662                     }
663                     break;
664     
665                 case 'procset':
666                     $o['info']['procset'] = $options;
667                     break;
668     
669                 case 'mediaBox':
670                     $o['info']['mediaBox'] = $options;
671                     // which should be an array of 4 numbers
672                     $this->currentPageSize = ['width' => $options[2], 'height' => $options[3]];
673                     break;
674     
675                 case 'font':
676                     $o['info']['fonts'][] = ['objNum' => $options['objNum'], 'fontNum' => $options['fontNum']];
677                     break;
678     
679                 case 'extGState':
680                     $o['info']['extGStates'][] = ['objNum' => $options['objNum'], 'stateNum' => $options['stateNum']];
681                     break;
682     
683                 case 'xObject':
684                     $o['info']['xObjects'][] = ['objNum' => $options['objNum'], 'label' => $options['label']];
685                     break;
686     
687                 case 'out':
688                     if (count($o['info']['pages'])) {
689                         $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Pages\n/Kids [";
690                         foreach ($o['info']['pages'] as $v) {
691                             $res .= "$v 0 R\n";
692                         }
693     
694                         $res .= "]\n/Count " . count($this->objects[$id]['info']['pages']);
695     
696                         if ((isset($o['info']['fonts']) && count($o['info']['fonts'])) ||
697                             isset($o['info']['procset']) ||
698                             (isset($o['info']['extGStates']) && count($o['info']['extGStates']))
699                         ) {
700                             $res .= "\n/Resources <<";
701     
702                             if (isset($o['info']['procset'])) {
703                                 $res .= "\n/ProcSet " . $o['info']['procset'] . " 0 R";
704                             }
705     
706                             if (isset($o['info']['fonts']) && count($o['info']['fonts'])) {
707                                 $res .= "\n/Font << ";
708                                 foreach ($o['info']['fonts'] as $finfo) {
709                                     $res .= "\n/F" . $finfo['fontNum'] . " " . $finfo['objNum'] . " 0 R";
710                                 }
711                                 $res .= "\n>>";
712                             }
713     
714                             if (isset($o['info']['xObjects']) && count($o['info']['xObjects'])) {
715                                 $res .= "\n/XObject << ";
716                                 foreach ($o['info']['xObjects'] as $finfo) {
717                                     $res .= "\n/" . $finfo['label'] . " " . $finfo['objNum'] . " 0 R";
718                                 }
719                                 $res .= "\n>>";
720                             }
721     
722                             if (isset($o['info']['extGStates']) && count($o['info']['extGStates'])) {
723                                 $res .= "\n/ExtGState << ";
724                                 foreach ($o['info']['extGStates'] as $gstate) {
725                                     $res .= "\n/GS" . $gstate['stateNum'] . " " . $gstate['objNum'] . " 0 R";
726                                 }
727                                 $res .= "\n>>";
728                             }
729     
730                             $res .= "\n>>";
731                             if (isset($o['info']['mediaBox'])) {
732                                 $tmp = $o['info']['mediaBox'];
733                                 $res .= "\n/MediaBox [" . sprintf(
734                                         '%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F',
735                                         $tmp[0],
736                                         $tmp[1],
737                                         $tmp[2],
738                                         $tmp[3]
739                                     ) . ']';
740                             }
741                         }
742     
743                         $res .= "\n >>\nendobj";
744                     } else {
745                         $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Pages\n/Count 0\n>>\nendobj";
746                     }
747     
748                     return $res;
749             }
750     
751             return null;
752         }
753     
754         /**
755          * define the outlines in the doc, empty for now
756          *
757          * @param $id
758          * @param $action
759          * @param string $options
760          * @return string|null
761          */
762         protected function o_outlines($id, $action, $options = '')
763         {
764             if ($action !== 'new') {
765                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
766             }
767     
768             switch ($action) {
769                 case 'new':
770                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'outlines', 'info' => ['outlines' => []]];
771                     $this->o_catalog($this->catalogId, 'outlines', $id);
772                     break;
773     
774                 case 'outline':
775                     $o['info']['outlines'][] = $options;
776                     break;
777     
778                 case 'out':
779                     if (count($o['info']['outlines'])) {
780                         $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Outlines /Kids [";
781                         foreach ($o['info']['outlines'] as $v) {
782                             $res .= "$v 0 R ";
783                         }
784     
785                         $res .= "] /Count " . count($o['info']['outlines']) . " >>\nendobj";
786                     } else {
787                         $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Outlines /Count 0 >>\nendobj";
788                     }
789     
790                     return $res;
791             }
792     
793             return null;
794         }
795     
796         /**
797          * an object to hold the font description
798          *
799          * @param $id
800          * @param $action
801          * @param string|array $options
802          * @return string|null
803          */
804         protected function o_font($id, $action, $options = '')
805         {
806             if ($action !== 'new') {
807                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
808             }
809     
810             switch ($action) {
811                 case 'new':
812                     $this->objects[$id] = [
813                         't'    => 'font',
814                         'info' => [
815                             'name'         => $options['name'],
816                             'fontFileName' => $options['fontFileName'],
817                             'SubType'      => 'Type1'
818                         ]
819                     ];
820                     $fontNum = $this->numFonts;
821                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['fontNum'] = $fontNum;
822     
823                     // deal with the encoding and the differences
824                     if (isset($options['differences'])) {
825                         // then we'll need an encoding dictionary
826                         $this->numObj++;
827                         $this->o_fontEncoding($this->numObj, 'new', $options);
828                         $this->objects[$id]['info']['encodingDictionary'] = $this->numObj;
829                     } else {
830                         if (isset($options['encoding'])) {
831                             // we can specify encoding here
832                             switch ($options['encoding']) {
833                                 case 'WinAnsiEncoding':
834                                 case 'MacRomanEncoding':
835                                 case 'MacExpertEncoding':
836                                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['encoding'] = $options['encoding'];
837                                     break;
838     
839                                 case 'none':
840                                     break;
841     
842                                 default:
843                                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['encoding'] = 'WinAnsiEncoding';
844                                     break;
845                             }
846                         } else {
847                             $this->objects[$id]['info']['encoding'] = 'WinAnsiEncoding';
848                         }
849                     }
850     
851                     if ($this->fonts[$options['fontFileName']]['isUnicode']) {
852                         // For Unicode fonts, we need to incorporate font data into
853                         // sub-sections that are linked from the primary font section.
854                         // Look at o_fontGIDtoCID and o_fontDescendentCID functions
855                         // for more information.
856                         //
857                         // All of this code is adapted from the excellent changes made to
858                         // transform FPDF to TCPDF (http://tcpdf.sourceforge.net/)
859     
860                         $toUnicodeId = ++$this->numObj;
861                         $this->o_toUnicode($toUnicodeId, 'new');
862                         $this->objects[$id]['info']['toUnicode'] = $toUnicodeId;
863     
864                         $cidFontId = ++$this->numObj;
865                         $this->o_fontDescendentCID($cidFontId, 'new', $options);
866                         $this->objects[$id]['info']['cidFont'] = $cidFontId;
867                     }
868     
869                     // also tell the pages node about the new font
870                     $this->o_pages($this->currentNode, 'font', ['fontNum' => $fontNum, 'objNum' => $id]);
871                     break;
872     
873                 case 'add':
874                     foreach ($options as $k => $v) {
875                         switch ($k) {
876                             case 'BaseFont':
877                                 $o['info']['name'] = $v;
878                                 break;
879                             case 'FirstChar':
880                             case 'LastChar':
881                             case 'Widths':
882                             case 'FontDescriptor':
883                             case 'SubType':
884                                 $this->addMessage('o_font ' . $k . " : " . $v);
885                                 $o['info'][$k] = $v;
886                                 break;
887                         }
888                     }
889     
890                     // pass values down to descendent font
891                     if (isset($o['info']['cidFont'])) {
892                         $this->o_fontDescendentCID($o['info']['cidFont'], 'add', $options);
893                     }
894                     break;
895     
896                 case 'out':
897                     if ($this->fonts[$this->objects[$id]['info']['fontFileName']]['isUnicode']) {
898                         // For Unicode fonts, we need to incorporate font data into
899                         // sub-sections that are linked from the primary font section.
900                         // Look at o_fontGIDtoCID and o_fontDescendentCID functions
901                         // for more information.
902                         //
903                         // All of this code is adapted from the excellent changes made to
904                         // transform FPDF to TCPDF (http://tcpdf.sourceforge.net/)
905     
906                         $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<</Type /Font\n/Subtype /Type0\n";
907                         $res .= "/BaseFont /" . $o['info']['name'] . "\n";
908     
909                         // The horizontal identity mapping for 2-byte CIDs; may be used
910                         // with CIDFonts using any Registry, Ordering, and Supplement values.
911                         $res .= "/Encoding /Identity-H\n";
912                         $res .= "/DescendantFonts [" . $o['info']['cidFont'] . " 0 R]\n";
913                         $res .= "/ToUnicode " . $o['info']['toUnicode'] . " 0 R\n";
914                         $res .= ">>\n";
915                         $res .= "endobj";
916                     } else {
917                         $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Font\n/Subtype /" . $o['info']['SubType'] . "\n";
918                         $res .= "/Name /F" . $o['info']['fontNum'] . "\n";
919                         $res .= "/BaseFont /" . $o['info']['name'] . "\n";
920     
921                         if (isset($o['info']['encodingDictionary'])) {
922                             // then place a reference to the dictionary
923                             $res .= "/Encoding " . $o['info']['encodingDictionary'] . " 0 R\n";
924                         } else {
925                             if (isset($o['info']['encoding'])) {
926                                 // use the specified encoding
927                                 $res .= "/Encoding /" . $o['info']['encoding'] . "\n";
928                             }
929                         }
930     
931                         if (isset($o['info']['FirstChar'])) {
932                             $res .= "/FirstChar " . $o['info']['FirstChar'] . "\n";
933                         }
934     
935                         if (isset($o['info']['LastChar'])) {
936                             $res .= "/LastChar " . $o['info']['LastChar'] . "\n";
937                         }
938     
939                         if (isset($o['info']['Widths'])) {
940                             $res .= "/Widths " . $o['info']['Widths'] . " 0 R\n";
941                         }
942     
943                         if (isset($o['info']['FontDescriptor'])) {
944                             $res .= "/FontDescriptor " . $o['info']['FontDescriptor'] . " 0 R\n";
945                         }
946     
947                         $res .= ">>\n";
948                         $res .= "endobj";
949                     }
950     
951                     return $res;
952             }
953     
954             return null;
955         }
956     
957         /**
958          * A toUnicode section, needed for unicode fonts
959          *
960          * @param $id
961          * @param $action
962          * @return null|string
963          */
964         protected function o_toUnicode($id, $action)
965         {
966             switch ($action) {
967                 case 'new':
968                     $this->objects[$id] = [
969                         't'    => 'toUnicode'
970                     ];
971                     break;
972                 case 'add':
973                     break;
974                 case 'out':
975                     $ordering = '(UCS)';
976                     $registry = '(Adobe)';
977     
978                     if ($this->encrypted) {
979                         $this->encryptInit($id);
980                         $ordering = $this->ARC4($ordering);
981                         $registry = $this->ARC4($registry);
982                     }
983     
984                     $stream = <<<EOT
985     /CIDInit /ProcSet findresource begin
986     12 dict begin
987     begincmap
988     /CIDSystemInfo
989     <</Registry $registry
990     /Ordering $ordering
991     /Supplement 0
992     >> def
993     /CMapName /Adobe-Identity-UCS def
994     /CMapType 2 def
995     1 begincodespacerange
996     <0000> <FFFF>
997     endcodespacerange
998     1 beginbfrange
999     <0000> <FFFF> <0000>
1000     endbfrange
1001     endcmap
1002     CMapName currentdict /CMap defineresource pop
1003     end
1004     end
1005     EOT;
1006     
1007                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n";
1008                     $res .= "<</Length " . mb_strlen($stream, '8bit') . " >>\n";
1009                     $res .= "stream\n" . $stream . "\nendstream" . "\nendobj";;
1010     
1011                     return $res;
1012             }
1013     
1014             return null;
1015         }
1016     
1017         /**
1018          * a font descriptor, needed for including additional fonts
1019          *
1020          * @param $id
1021          * @param $action
1022          * @param string $options
1023          * @return null|string
1024          */
1025         protected function o_fontDescriptor($id, $action, $options = '')
1026         {
1027             if ($action !== 'new') {
1028                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1029             }
1030     
1031             switch ($action) {
1032                 case 'new':
1033                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'fontDescriptor', 'info' => $options];
1034                     break;
1035     
1036                 case 'out':
1037                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /FontDescriptor\n";
1038                     foreach ($o['info'] as $label => $value) {
1039                         switch ($label) {
1040                             case 'Ascent':
1041                             case 'CapHeight':
1042                             case 'Descent':
1043                             case 'Flags':
1044                             case 'ItalicAngle':
1045                             case 'StemV':
1046                             case 'AvgWidth':
1047                             case 'Leading':
1048                             case 'MaxWidth':
1049                             case 'MissingWidth':
1050                             case 'StemH':
1051                             case 'XHeight':
1052                             case 'CharSet':
1053                                 if (mb_strlen($value, '8bit')) {
1054                                     $res .= "/$label $value\n";
1055                                 }
1056     
1057                                 break;
1058                             case 'FontFile':
1059                             case 'FontFile2':
1060                             case 'FontFile3':
1061                                 $res .= "/$label $value 0 R\n";
1062                                 break;
1063     
1064                             case 'FontBBox':
1065                                 $res .= "/$label [$value[0] $value[1] $value[2] $value[3]]\n";
1066                                 break;
1067     
1068                             case 'FontName':
1069                                 $res .= "/$label /$value\n";
1070                                 break;
1071                         }
1072                     }
1073     
1074                     $res .= ">>\nendobj";
1075     
1076                     return $res;
1077             }
1078     
1079             return null;
1080         }
1081     
1082         /**
1083          * the font encoding
1084          *
1085          * @param $id
1086          * @param $action
1087          * @param string $options
1088          * @return null|string
1089          */
1090         protected function o_fontEncoding($id, $action, $options = '')
1091         {
1092             if ($action !== 'new') {
1093                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1094             }
1095     
1096             switch ($action) {
1097                 case 'new':
1098                     // the options array should contain 'differences' and maybe 'encoding'
1099                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'fontEncoding', 'info' => $options];
1100                     break;
1101     
1102                 case 'out':
1103                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Encoding\n";
1104                     if (!isset($o['info']['encoding'])) {
1105                         $o['info']['encoding'] = 'WinAnsiEncoding';
1106                     }
1107     
1108                     if ($o['info']['encoding'] !== 'none') {
1109                         $res .= "/BaseEncoding /" . $o['info']['encoding'] . "\n";
1110                     }
1111     
1112                     $res .= "/Differences \n[";
1113     
1114                     $onum = -100;
1115     
1116                     foreach ($o['info']['differences'] as $num => $label) {
1117                         if ($num != $onum + 1) {
1118                             // we cannot make use of consecutive numbering
1119                             $res .= "\n$num /$label";
1120                         } else {
1121                             $res .= " /$label";
1122                         }
1123     
1124                         $onum = $num;
1125                     }
1126     
1127                     $res .= "\n]\n>>\nendobj";
1128     
1129                     return $res;
1130             }
1131     
1132             return null;
1133         }
1134     
1135         /**
1136          * a descendent cid font, needed for unicode fonts
1137          *
1138          * @param $id
1139          * @param $action
1140          * @param string|array $options
1141          * @return null|string
1142          */
1143         protected function o_fontDescendentCID($id, $action, $options = '')
1144         {
1145             if ($action !== 'new') {
1146                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1147             }
1148     
1149             switch ($action) {
1150                 case 'new':
1151                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'fontDescendentCID', 'info' => $options];
1152     
1153                     // we need a CID system info section
1154                     $cidSystemInfoId = ++$this->numObj;
1155                     $this->o_cidSystemInfo($cidSystemInfoId, 'new');
1156                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['cidSystemInfo'] = $cidSystemInfoId;
1157     
1158                     // and a CID to GID map
1159                     $cidToGidMapId = ++$this->numObj;
1160                     $this->o_fontGIDtoCIDMap($cidToGidMapId, 'new', $options);
1161                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['cidToGidMap'] = $cidToGidMapId;
1162                     break;
1163     
1164                 case 'add':
1165                     foreach ($options as $k => $v) {
1166                         switch ($k) {
1167                             case 'BaseFont':
1168                                 $o['info']['name'] = $v;
1169                                 break;
1170     
1171                             case 'FirstChar':
1172                             case 'LastChar':
1173                             case 'MissingWidth':
1174                             case 'FontDescriptor':
1175                             case 'SubType':
1176                                 $this->addMessage("o_fontDescendentCID $k : $v");
1177                                 $o['info'][$k] = $v;
1178                                 break;
1179                         }
1180                     }
1181     
1182                     // pass values down to cid to gid map
1183                     $this->o_fontGIDtoCIDMap($o['info']['cidToGidMap'], 'add', $options);
1184                     break;
1185     
1186                 case 'out':
1187                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n";
1188                     $res .= "<</Type /Font\n";
1189                     $res .= "/Subtype /CIDFontType2\n";
1190                     $res .= "/BaseFont /" . $o['info']['name'] . "\n";
1191                     $res .= "/CIDSystemInfo " . $o['info']['cidSystemInfo'] . " 0 R\n";
1192                     //      if (isset($o['info']['FirstChar'])) {
1193                     //        $res.= "/FirstChar ".$o['info']['FirstChar']."\n";
1194                     //      }
1195     
1196                     //      if (isset($o['info']['LastChar'])) {
1197                     //        $res.= "/LastChar ".$o['info']['LastChar']."\n";
1198                     //      }
1199                     if (isset($o['info']['FontDescriptor'])) {
1200                         $res .= "/FontDescriptor " . $o['info']['FontDescriptor'] . " 0 R\n";
1201                     }
1202     
1203                     if (isset($o['info']['MissingWidth'])) {
1204                         $res .= "/DW " . $o['info']['MissingWidth'] . "\n";
1205                     }
1206     
1207                     if (isset($o['info']['fontFileName']) && isset($this->fonts[$o['info']['fontFileName']]['CIDWidths'])) {
1208                         $cid_widths = &$this->fonts[$o['info']['fontFileName']]['CIDWidths'];
1209                         $w = '';
1210                         foreach ($cid_widths as $cid => $width) {
1211                             $w .= "$cid [$width] ";
1212                         }
1213                         $res .= "/W [$w]\n";
1214                     }
1215     
1216                     $res .= "/CIDToGIDMap " . $o['info']['cidToGidMap'] . " 0 R\n";
1217                     $res .= ">>\n";
1218                     $res .= "endobj";
1219     
1220                     return $res;
1221             }
1222     
1223             return null;
1224         }
1225     
1226         /**
1227          * CID system info section, needed for unicode fonts
1228          *
1229          * @param $id
1230          * @param $action
1231          * @return null|string
1232          */
1233         protected function o_cidSystemInfo($id, $action)
1234         {
1235             switch ($action) {
1236                 case 'new':
1237                     $this->objects[$id] = [
1238                         't' => 'cidSystemInfo'
1239                     ];
1240                     break;
1241                 case 'add':
1242                     break;
1243                 case 'out':
1244                     $ordering = '(UCS)';
1245                     $registry = '(Adobe)';
1246     
1247                     if ($this->encrypted) {
1248                         $this->encryptInit($id);
1249                         $ordering = $this->ARC4($ordering);
1250                         $registry = $this->ARC4($registry);
1251                     }
1252     
1253     
1254                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n";
1255     
1256                     $res .= '<</Registry ' . $registry . "\n"; // A string identifying an issuer of character collections
1257                     $res .= '/Ordering ' . $ordering . "\n"; // A string that uniquely names a character collection issued by a specific registry
1258                     $res .= "/Supplement 0\n"; // The supplement number of the character collection.
1259                     $res .= ">>";
1260     
1261                     $res .= "\nendobj";;
1262     
1263                     return $res;
1264             }
1265     
1266             return null;
1267         }
1268     
1269         /**
1270          * a font glyph to character map, needed for unicode fonts
1271          *
1272          * @param $id
1273          * @param $action
1274          * @param string $options
1275          * @return null|string
1276          */
1277         protected function o_fontGIDtoCIDMap($id, $action, $options = '')
1278         {
1279             if ($action !== 'new') {
1280                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1281             }
1282     
1283             switch ($action) {
1284                 case 'new':
1285                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'fontGIDtoCIDMap', 'info' => $options];
1286                     break;
1287     
1288                 case 'out':
1289                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n";
1290                     $fontFileName = $o['info']['fontFileName'];
1291                     $tmp = $this->fonts[$fontFileName]['CIDtoGID'] = base64_decode($this->fonts[$fontFileName]['CIDtoGID']);
1292     
1293                     $compressed = isset($this->fonts[$fontFileName]['CIDtoGID_Compressed']) &&
1294                         $this->fonts[$fontFileName]['CIDtoGID_Compressed'];
1295     
1296                     if (!$compressed && isset($o['raw'])) {
1297                         $res .= $tmp;
1298                     } else {
1299                         $res .= "<<";
1300     
1301                         if (!$compressed && $this->compressionReady && $this->options['compression']) {
1302                             // then implement ZLIB based compression on this content stream
1303                             $compressed = true;
1304                             $tmp = gzcompress($tmp, 6);
1305                         }
1306                         if ($compressed) {
1307                             $res .= "\n/Filter /FlateDecode";
1308                         }
1309     
1310                         if ($this->encrypted) {
1311                             $this->encryptInit($id);
1312                             $tmp = $this->ARC4($tmp);
1313                         }
1314     
1315                         $res .= "\n/Length " . mb_strlen($tmp, '8bit') . ">>\nstream\n$tmp\nendstream";
1316                     }
1317     
1318                     $res .= "\nendobj";
1319     
1320                     return $res;
1321             }
1322     
1323             return null;
1324         }
1325     
1326         /**
1327          * the document procset, solves some problems with printing to old PS printers
1328          *
1329          * @param $id
1330          * @param $action
1331          * @param string $options
1332          * @return null|string
1333          */
1334         protected function o_procset($id, $action, $options = '')
1335         {
1336             if ($action !== 'new') {
1337                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1338             }
1339     
1340             switch ($action) {
1341                 case 'new':
1342                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'procset', 'info' => ['PDF' => 1, 'Text' => 1]];
1343                     $this->o_pages($this->currentNode, 'procset', $id);
1344                     $this->procsetObjectId = $id;
1345                     break;
1346     
1347                 case 'add':
1348                     // this is to add new items to the procset list, despite the fact that this is considered
1349                     // obsolete, the items are required for printing to some postscript printers
1350                     switch ($options) {
1351                         case 'ImageB':
1352                         case 'ImageC':
1353                         case 'ImageI':
1354                             $o['info'][$options] = 1;
1355                             break;
1356                     }
1357                     break;
1358     
1359                 case 'out':
1360                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n[";
1361                     foreach ($o['info'] as $label => $val) {
1362                         $res .= "/$label ";
1363                     }
1364                     $res .= "]\nendobj";
1365     
1366                     return $res;
1367             }
1368     
1369             return null;
1370         }
1371     
1372         /**
1373          * define the document information
1374          *
1375          * @param $id
1376          * @param $action
1377          * @param string $options
1378          * @return null|string
1379          */
1380         protected function o_info($id, $action, $options = '')
1381         {
1382             switch ($action) {
1383                 case 'new':
1384                     $this->infoObject = $id;
1385                     $date = 'D:' . @date('Ymd');
1386                     $this->objects[$id] = [
1387                         't'    => 'info',
1388                         'info' => [
1389                             'Producer'      => 'CPDF (dompdf)',
1390                             'CreationDate' => $date
1391                         ]
1392                     ];
1393                     break;
1394                 case 'Title':
1395                 case 'Author':
1396                 case 'Subject':
1397                 case 'Keywords':
1398                 case 'Creator':
1399                 case 'Producer':
1400                 case 'CreationDate':
1401                 case 'ModDate':
1402                 case 'Trapped':
1403                     $this->objects[$id]['info'][$action] = $options;
1404                     break;
1405     
1406                 case 'out':
1407                     $encrypted = $this->encrypted;
1408                     if ($encrypted) {
1409                         $this->encryptInit($id);
1410                     }
1411     
1412                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<<\n";
1413                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1414                     foreach ($o['info'] as $k => $v) {
1415                         $res .= "/$k (";
1416     
1417                         // dates must be outputted as-is, without Unicode transformations
1418                         if ($k !== 'CreationDate' && $k !== 'ModDate') {
1419                             $v = $this->filterText($v, true, false);
1420                         }
1421     
1422                         if ($encrypted) {
1423                             $v = $this->ARC4($v);
1424                         }
1425     
1426                         $res .= $v;
1427                         $res .= ")\n";
1428                     }
1429     
1430                     $res .= ">>\nendobj";
1431     
1432                     return $res;
1433             }
1434     
1435             return null;
1436         }
1437     
1438         /**
1439          * an action object, used to link to URLS initially
1440          *
1441          * @param $id
1442          * @param $action
1443          * @param string $options
1444          * @return null|string
1445          */
1446         protected function o_action($id, $action, $options = '')
1447         {
1448             if ($action !== 'new') {
1449                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1450             }
1451     
1452             switch ($action) {
1453                 case 'new':
1454                     if (is_array($options)) {
1455                         $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'action', 'info' => $options, 'type' => $options['type']];
1456                     } else {
1457                         // then assume a URI action
1458                         $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'action', 'info' => $options, 'type' => 'URI'];
1459                     }
1460                     break;
1461     
1462                 case 'out':
1463                     if ($this->encrypted) {
1464                         $this->encryptInit($id);
1465                     }
1466     
1467                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Action";
1468                     switch ($o['type']) {
1469                         case 'ilink':
1470                             if (!isset($this->destinations[(string)$o['info']['label']])) {
1471                                 break;
1472                             }
1473     
1474                             // there will be an 'label' setting, this is the name of the destination
1475                             $res .= "\n/S /GoTo\n/D " . $this->destinations[(string)$o['info']['label']] . " 0 R";
1476                             break;
1477     
1478                         case 'URI':
1479                             $res .= "\n/S /URI\n/URI (";
1480                             if ($this->encrypted) {
1481                                 $res .= $this->filterText($this->ARC4($o['info']), false, false);
1482                             } else {
1483                                 $res .= $this->filterText($o['info'], false, false);
1484                             }
1485     
1486                             $res .= ")";
1487                             break;
1488                     }
1489     
1490                     $res .= "\n>>\nendobj";
1491     
1492                     return $res;
1493             }
1494     
1495             return null;
1496         }
1497     
1498         /**
1499          * an annotation object, this will add an annotation to the current page.
1500          * initially will support just link annotations
1501          *
1502          * @param $id
1503          * @param $action
1504          * @param string $options
1505          * @return null|string
1506          */
1507         protected function o_annotation($id, $action, $options = '')
1508         {
1509             if ($action !== 'new') {
1510                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1511             }
1512     
1513             switch ($action) {
1514                 case 'new':
1515                     // add the annotation to the current page
1516                     $pageId = $this->currentPage;
1517                     $this->o_page($pageId, 'annot', $id);
1518     
1519                     // and add the action object which is going to be required
1520                     switch ($options['type']) {
1521                         case 'link':
1522                             $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'annotation', 'info' => $options];
1523                             $this->numObj++;
1524                             $this->o_action($this->numObj, 'new', $options['url']);
1525                             $this->objects[$id]['info']['actionId'] = $this->numObj;
1526                             break;
1527     
1528                         case 'ilink':
1529                             // this is to a named internal link
1530                             $label = $options['label'];
1531                             $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'annotation', 'info' => $options];
1532                             $this->numObj++;
1533                             $this->o_action($this->numObj, 'new', ['type' => 'ilink', 'label' => $label]);
1534                             $this->objects[$id]['info']['actionId'] = $this->numObj;
1535                             break;
1536                     }
1537                     break;
1538     
1539                 case 'out':
1540                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Annot";
1541                     switch ($o['info']['type']) {
1542                         case 'link':
1543                         case 'ilink':
1544                             $res .= "\n/Subtype /Link";
1545                             break;
1546                     }
1547                     $res .= "\n/A " . $o['info']['actionId'] . " 0 R";
1548                     $res .= "\n/Border [0 0 0]";
1549                     $res .= "\n/H /I";
1550                     $res .= "\n/Rect [ ";
1551     
1552                     foreach ($o['info']['rect'] as $v) {
1553                         $res .= sprintf("%.4F ", $v);
1554                     }
1555     
1556                     $res .= "]";
1557                     $res .= "\n>>\nendobj";
1558     
1559                     return $res;
1560             }
1561     
1562             return null;
1563         }
1564     
1565         /**
1566          * a page object, it also creates a contents object to hold its contents
1567          *
1568          * @param $id
1569          * @param $action
1570          * @param string $options
1571          * @return null|string
1572          */
1573         protected function o_page($id, $action, $options = '')
1574         {
1575             if ($action !== 'new') {
1576                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1577             }
1578     
1579             switch ($action) {
1580                 case 'new':
1581                     $this->numPages++;
1582                     $this->objects[$id] = [
1583                         't'    => 'page',
1584                         'info' => [
1585                             'parent'  => $this->currentNode,
1586                             'pageNum' => $this->numPages,
1587                             'mediaBox' => $this->objects[$this->currentNode]['info']['mediaBox']
1588                         ]
1589                     ];
1590     
1591                     if (is_array($options)) {
1592                         // then this must be a page insertion, array should contain 'rid','pos'=[before|after]
1593                         $options['id'] = $id;
1594                         $this->o_pages($this->currentNode, 'page', $options);
1595                     } else {
1596                         $this->o_pages($this->currentNode, 'page', $id);
1597                     }
1598     
1599                     $this->currentPage = $id;
1600                     //make a contents object to go with this page
1601                     $this->numObj++;
1602                     $this->o_contents($this->numObj, 'new', $id);
1603                     $this->currentContents = $this->numObj;
1604                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['contents'] = [];
1605                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['contents'][] = $this->numObj;
1606     
1607                     $match = ($this->numPages % 2 ? 'odd' : 'even');
1608                     foreach ($this->addLooseObjects as $oId => $target) {
1609                         if ($target === 'all' || $match === $target) {
1610                             $this->objects[$id]['info']['contents'][] = $oId;
1611                         }
1612                     }
1613                     break;
1614     
1615                 case 'content':
1616                     $o['info']['contents'][] = $options;
1617                     break;
1618     
1619                 case 'annot':
1620                     // add an annotation to this page
1621                     if (!isset($o['info']['annot'])) {
1622                         $o['info']['annot'] = [];
1623                     }
1624     
1625                     // $options should contain the id of the annotation dictionary
1626                     $o['info']['annot'][] = $options;
1627                     break;
1628     
1629                 case 'out':
1630                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /Page";
1631                     if (isset($o['info']['mediaBox'])) {
1632                         $tmp = $o['info']['mediaBox'];
1633                         $res .= "\n/MediaBox [" . sprintf(
1634                                 '%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F',
1635                                 $tmp[0],
1636                                 $tmp[1],
1637                                 $tmp[2],
1638                                 $tmp[3]
1639                             ) . ']';
1640                     }
1641                     $res .= "\n/Parent " . $o['info']['parent'] . " 0 R";
1642     
1643                     if (isset($o['info']['annot'])) {
1644                         $res .= "\n/Annots [";
1645                         foreach ($o['info']['annot'] as $aId) {
1646                             $res .= " $aId 0 R";
1647                         }
1648                         $res .= " ]";
1649                     }
1650     
1651                     $count = count($o['info']['contents']);
1652                     if ($count == 1) {
1653                         $res .= "\n/Contents " . $o['info']['contents'][0] . " 0 R";
1654                     } else {
1655                         if ($count > 1) {
1656                             $res .= "\n/Contents [\n";
1657     
1658                             // reverse the page contents so added objects are below normal content
1659                             //foreach (array_reverse($o['info']['contents']) as $cId) {
1660                             // Back to normal now that I've got transparency working --Benj
1661                             foreach ($o['info']['contents'] as $cId) {
1662                                 $res .= "$cId 0 R\n";
1663                             }
1664                             $res .= "]";
1665                         }
1666                     }
1667     
1668                     $res .= "\n>>\nendobj";
1669     
1670                     return $res;
1671             }
1672     
1673             return null;
1674         }
1675     
1676         /**
1677          * the contents objects hold all of the content which appears on pages
1678          *
1679          * @param $id
1680          * @param $action
1681          * @param string|array $options
1682          * @return null|string
1683          */
1684         protected function o_contents($id, $action, $options = '')
1685         {
1686             if ($action !== 'new') {
1687                 $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1688             }
1689     
1690             switch ($action) {
1691                 case 'new':
1692                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'contents', 'c' => '', 'info' => []];
1693                     if (mb_strlen($options, '8bit') && intval($options)) {
1694                         // then this contents is the primary for a page
1695                         $this->objects[$id]['onPage'] = $options;
1696                     } else {
1697                         if ($options === 'raw') {
1698                             // then this page contains some other type of system object
1699                             $this->objects[$id]['raw'] = 1;
1700                         }
1701                     }
1702                     break;
1703     
1704                 case 'add':
1705                     // add more options to the declaration
1706                     foreach ($options as $k => $v) {
1707                         $o['info'][$k] = $v;
1708                     }
1709     
1710                 case 'out':
1711                     $tmp = $o['c'];
1712                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n";
1713     
1714                     if (isset($this->objects[$id]['raw'])) {
1715                         $res .= $tmp;
1716                     } else {
1717                         $res .= "<<";
1718                         if ($this->compressionReady && $this->options['compression']) {
1719                             // then implement ZLIB based compression on this content stream
1720                             $res .= " /Filter /FlateDecode";
1721                             $tmp = gzcompress($tmp, 6);
1722                         }
1723     
1724                         if ($this->encrypted) {
1725                             $this->encryptInit($id);
1726                             $tmp = $this->ARC4($tmp);
1727                         }
1728     
1729                         foreach ($o['info'] as $k => $v) {
1730                             $res .= "\n/$k $v";
1731                         }
1732     
1733                         $res .= "\n/Length " . mb_strlen($tmp, '8bit') . " >>\nstream\n$tmp\nendstream";
1734                     }
1735     
1736                     $res .= "\nendobj";
1737     
1738                     return $res;
1739             }
1740     
1741             return null;
1742         }
1743

1745          * @param $id

1747          * @return string|null
1748          */
1749         protected function o_embedjs($id, $action)

1757                         ]
1758                     ];
1759                     break;
1760     
1761                 case 'out':
1762                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1763                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< ";
1764                     foreach ($o['info'] as $k => $v) {
1765                         $res .= "\n/$k $v";
1766                     }
1767                     $res .= "\n>>\nendobj";
1768     
1769                     return $res;
1770             }
1771     
1772             return null;
1773         }

1809         /**
1810          * an image object, will be an XObject in the document, includes description and data
1811          *
1812          * @param $id
1813          * @param $action
1814          * @param string $options
1815          * @return null|string
1816          */
1817         protected function o_image($id, $action, $options = '')
1818         {
1819             switch ($action) {
1820                 case 'new':
1821                     // make the new object
1822                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'image', 'data' => &$options['data'], 'info' => []];
1823     
1824                     $info =& $this->objects[$id]['info'];
1825     
1826                     $info['Type'] = '/XObject';
1827                     $info['Subtype'] = '/Image';
1828                     $info['Width'] = $options['iw'];
1829                     $info['Height'] = $options['ih'];
1830     
1831                     if (isset($options['masked']) && $options['masked']) {
1832                         $info['SMask'] = ($this->numObj - 1) . ' 0 R';
1833                     }
1834     
1835                     if (!isset($options['type']) || $options['type'] === 'jpg') {
1836                         if (!isset($options['channels'])) {
1837                             $options['channels'] = 3;
1838                         }
1839     
1840                         switch ($options['channels']) {
1841                             case 1:
1842                                 $info['ColorSpace'] = '/DeviceGray';
1843                                 break;
1844                             case 4:
1845                                 $info['ColorSpace'] = '/DeviceCMYK';
1846                                 break;
1847                             default:
1848                                 $info['ColorSpace'] = '/DeviceRGB';
1849                                 break;
1850                         }
1851     
1852                         if ($info['ColorSpace'] === '/DeviceCMYK') {
1853                             $info['Decode'] = '[1 0 1 0 1 0 1 0]';
1854                         }
1855     
1856                         $info['Filter'] = '/DCTDecode';
1857                         $info['BitsPerComponent'] = 8;
1858                     } else {
1859                         if ($options['type'] === 'png') {
1860                             $info['Filter'] = '/FlateDecode';
1861                             $info['DecodeParms'] = '<< /Predictor 15 /Colors ' . $options['ncolor'] . ' /Columns ' . $options['iw'] . ' /BitsPerComponent ' . $options['bitsPerComponent'] . '>>';
1862     
1863                             if ($options['isMask']) {
1864                                 $info['ColorSpace'] = '/DeviceGray';
1865                             } else {
1866                                 if (mb_strlen($options['pdata'], '8bit')) {
1867                                     $tmp = ' [ /Indexed /DeviceRGB ' . (mb_strlen($options['pdata'], '8bit') / 3 - 1) . ' ';
1868                                     $this->numObj++;
1869                                     $this->o_contents($this->numObj, 'new');
1870                                     $this->objects[$this->numObj]['c'] = $options['pdata'];
1871                                     $tmp .= $this->numObj . ' 0 R';
1872                                     $tmp .= ' ]';
1873                                     $info['ColorSpace'] = $tmp;
1874     
1875                                     if (isset($options['transparency'])) {
1876                                         $transparency = $options['transparency'];
1877                                         switch ($transparency['type']) {
1878                                             case 'indexed':
1879                                                 $tmp = ' [ ' . $transparency['data'] . ' ' . $transparency['data'] . '] ';
1880                                                 $info['Mask'] = $tmp;
1881                                                 break;
1882     
1883                                             case 'color-key':
1884                                                 $tmp = ' [ ' .
1885                                                     $transparency['r'] . ' ' . $transparency['r'] .
1886                                                     $transparency['g'] . ' ' . $transparency['g'] .
1887                                                     $transparency['b'] . ' ' . $transparency['b'] .
1888                                                     ' ] ';
1889                                                 $info['Mask'] = $tmp;
1890                                                 break;
1891                                         }
1892                                     }
1893                                 } else {
1894                                     if (isset($options['transparency'])) {
1895                                         $transparency = $options['transparency'];
1896     
1897                                         switch ($transparency['type']) {
1898                                             case 'indexed':
1899                                                 $tmp = ' [ ' . $transparency['data'] . ' ' . $transparency['data'] . '] ';
1900                                                 $info['Mask'] = $tmp;
1901                                                 break;
1902     
1903                                             case 'color-key':
1904                                                 $tmp = ' [ ' .
1905                                                     $transparency['r'] . ' ' . $transparency['r'] . ' ' .
1906                                                     $transparency['g'] . ' ' . $transparency['g'] . ' ' .
1907                                                     $transparency['b'] . ' ' . $transparency['b'] .
1908                                                     ' ] ';
1909                                                 $info['Mask'] = $tmp;
1910                                                 break;
1911                                         }
1912                                     }
1913                                     $info['ColorSpace'] = '/' . $options['color'];
1914                                 }
1915                             }
1916     
1917                             $info['BitsPerComponent'] = $options['bitsPerComponent'];
1918                         }
1919                     }
1920     
1921                     // assign it a place in the named resource dictionary as an external object, according to
1922                     // the label passed in with it.
1923                     $this->o_pages($this->currentNode, 'xObject', ['label' => $options['label'], 'objNum' => $id]);
1924     
1925                     // also make sure that we have the right procset object for it.
1926                     $this->o_procset($this->procsetObjectId, 'add', 'ImageC');
1927                     break;
1928     
1929                 case 'out':
1930                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
1931                     $tmp = &$o['data'];
1932                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<<";
1933     
1934                     foreach ($o['info'] as $k => $v) {
1935                         $res .= "\n/$k $v";
1936                     }
1937     
1938                     if ($this->encrypted) {
1939                         $this->encryptInit($id);
1940                         $tmp = $this->ARC4($tmp);
1941                     }
1942     
1943                     $res .= "\n/Length " . mb_strlen($tmp, '8bit') . ">>\nstream\n$tmp\nendstream\nendobj";
1944     
1945                     return $res;
1946             }
1947     
1948             return null;
1949         }

1951         /**
1952          * graphics state object
1953          *
1954          * @param $id
1955          * @param $action
1956          * @param string $options
1957          * @return null|string
1958          */
1959         protected function o_extGState($id, $action, $options = "")
1960         {
1961             static $valid_params = [
1962                 "LW",
1963                 "LC",
1964                 "LC",
1965                 "LJ",
1966                 "ML",
1967                 "D",
1968                 "RI",
1969                 "OP",
1970                 "op",
1971                 "OPM",
1972                 "Font",
1973                 "BG",
1974                 "BG2",
1975                 "UCR",
1976                 "TR",
1977                 "TR2",
1978                 "HT",
1979                 "FL",
1980                 "SM",
1981                 "SA",
1982                 "BM",
1983                 "SMask",
1984                 "CA",
1985                 "ca",
1986                 "AIS",
1987                 "TK"
1988             ];
1989     
1990             switch ($action) {
1991                 case "new":
1992                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'extGState', 'info' => $options];
1993     
1994                     // Tell the pages about the new resource
1995                     $this->numStates++;
1996                     $this->o_pages($this->currentNode, 'extGState', ["objNum" => $id, "stateNum" => $this->numStates]);
1997                     break;
1998     
1999                 case "out":
2000                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
2001                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<< /Type /ExtGState\n";
2002     
2003                     foreach ($o["info"] as $k => $v) {
2004                         if (!in_array($k, $valid_params)) {
2005                             continue;
2006                         }
2007                         $res .= "/$k $v\n";
2008                     }
2009     
2010                     $res .= ">>\nendobj";
2011     
2012                     return $res;
2013             }
2014     
2015             return null;
2016         }
2017     
2018         /**
2019          * encryption object.
2020          *
2021          * @param $id
2022          * @param $action
2023          * @param string $options
2024          * @return string|null
2025          */
2026         protected function o_encryption($id, $action, $options = '')
2027         {
2028             switch ($action) {
2029                 case 'new':
2030                     // make the new object
2031                     $this->objects[$id] = ['t' => 'encryption', 'info' => $options];
2032                     $this->arc4_objnum = $id;
2033                     break;
2034     
2035                 case 'keys':
2036                     // figure out the additional parameters required
2037                     $pad = chr(0x28) . chr(0xBF) . chr(0x4E) . chr(0x5E) . chr(0x4E) . chr(0x75) . chr(0x8A) . chr(0x41)
2038                         . chr(0x64) . chr(0x00) . chr(0x4E) . chr(0x56) . chr(0xFF) . chr(0xFA) . chr(0x01) . chr(0x08)
2039                         . chr(0x2E) . chr(0x2E) . chr(0x00) . chr(0xB6) . chr(0xD0) . chr(0x68) . chr(0x3E) . chr(0x80)
2040                         . chr(0x2F) . chr(0x0C) . chr(0xA9) . chr(0xFE) . chr(0x64) . chr(0x53) . chr(0x69) . chr(0x7A);
2041     
2042                     $info = $this->objects[$id]['info'];
2043     
2044                     $len = mb_strlen($info['owner'], '8bit');
2045     
2046                     if ($len > 32) {
2047                         $owner = substr($info['owner'], 0, 32);
2048                     } else {
2049                         if ($len < 32) {
2050                             $owner = $info['owner'] . substr($pad, 0, 32 - $len);
2051                         } else {
2052                             $owner = $info['owner'];
2053                         }
2054                     }
2055     
2056                     $len = mb_strlen($info['user'], '8bit');
2057                     if ($len > 32) {
2058                         $user = substr($info['user'], 0, 32);
2059                     } else {
2060                         if ($len < 32) {
2061                             $user = $info['user'] . substr($pad, 0, 32 - $len);
2062                         } else {
2063                             $user = $info['user'];
2064                         }
2065                     }
2066     
2067                     $tmp = $this->md5_16($owner);
2068                     $okey = substr($tmp, 0, 5);
2069                     $this->ARC4_init($okey);
2070                     $ovalue = $this->ARC4($user);
2071                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['O'] = $ovalue;
2072     
2073                     // now make the u value, phew.
2074                     $tmp = $this->md5_16(
2075                         $user . $ovalue . chr($info['p']) . chr(255) . chr(255) . chr(255) . hex2bin($this->fileIdentifier)
2076                     );
2077     
2078                     $ukey = substr($tmp, 0, 5);
2079                     $this->ARC4_init($ukey);
2080                     $this->encryptionKey = $ukey;
2081                     $this->encrypted = true;
2082                     $uvalue = $this->ARC4($pad);
2083                     $this->objects[$id]['info']['U'] = $uvalue;
2084                     // initialize the arc4 array
2085                     break;
2086     
2087                 case 'out':
2088                     $o = &$this->objects[$id];
2089     
2090                     $res = "\n$id 0 obj\n<<";
2091                     $res .= "\n/Filter /Standard";
2092                     $res .= "\n/V 1";
2093                     $res .= "\n/R 2";
2094                     $res .= "\n/O (" . $this->filterText($o['info']['O'], false, false) . ')';
2095                     $res .= "\n/U (" . $this->filterText($o['info']['U'], false, false) . ')';
2096                     // and the p-value needs to be converted to account for the twos-complement approach
2097                     $o['info']['p'] = (($o['info']['p'] ^ 255) + 1) * -1;
2098                     $res .= "\n/P " . ($o['info']['p']);
2099                     $res .= "\n>>\nendobj";
2100     
2101                     return $res;
2102             }
2103     
2104             return null;
2105         }
2106     
2107         /**
2108          * ARC4 functions
2109          * A series of function to implement ARC4 encoding in PHP
2110          */
2111     
2112         /**
2113          * calculate the 16 byte version of the 128 bit md5 digest of the string
2114          *
2115          * @param $string
2116          * @return string
2117          */
2118         function md5_16($string)
2119         {
2120             $tmp = md5($string);
2121             $out = '';
2122             for ($i = 0; $i <= 30; $i = $i + 2) {
2123                 $out .= chr(hexdec(substr($tmp, $i, 2)));
2124             }
2125     
2126             return $out;
2127         }
2128     
2129         /**
2130          * initialize the encryption for processing a particular object
2131          *
2132          * @param $id
2133          */
2134         function encryptInit($id)
2135         {
2136             $tmp = $this->encryptionKey;
2137             $hex = dechex($id);
2138             if (mb_strlen($hex, '8bit') < 6) {
2139                 $hex = substr('000000', 0, 6 - mb_strlen($hex, '8bit')) . $hex;
2140             }
2141             $tmp .= chr(hexdec(substr($hex, 4, 2)))
2142                 . chr(hexdec(substr($hex, 2, 2)))
2143                 . chr(hexdec(substr($hex, 0, 2)))
2144                 . chr(0)
2145                 . chr(0)
2146             ;
2147             $key = $this->md5_16($tmp);
2148             $this->ARC4_init(substr($key, 0, 10));
2149         }
2150     
2151         /**
2152          * initialize the ARC4 encryption
2153          *
2154          * @param string $key
2155          */
2156         function ARC4_init($key = '')
2157         {
2158             $this->arc4 = '';
2159     
2160             // setup the control array
2161             if (mb_strlen($key, '8bit') == 0) {
2162                 return;
2163             }
2164     
2165             $k = '';
2166             while (mb_strlen($k, '8bit') < 256) {
2167                 $k .= $key;
2168             }
2169     
2170             $k = substr($k, 0, 256);
2171             for ($i = 0; $i < 256; $i++) {
2172                 $this->arc4 .= chr($i);
2173             }
2174     
2175             $j = 0;
2176     
2177             for ($i = 0; $i < 256; $i++) {
2178                 $t = $this->arc4[$i];
2179                 $j = ($j + ord($t) + ord($k[$i])) % 256;
2180                 $this->arc4[$i] = $this->arc4[$j];
2181                 $this->arc4[$j] = $t;
2182             }
2183         }
2184     
2185         /**
2186          * ARC4 encrypt a text string
2187          *
2188          * @param $text
2189          * @return string
2190          */
2191         function ARC4($text)
2192         {
2193             $len = mb_strlen($text, '8bit');
2194             $a = 0;
2195             $b = 0;
2196             $c = $this->arc4;
2197             $out = '';
2198             for ($i = 0; $i < $len; $i++) {
2199                 $a = ($a + 1) % 256;
2200                 $t = $c[$a];
2201                 $b = ($b + ord($t)) % 256;
2202                 $c[$a] = $c[$b];
2203                 $c[$b] = $t;
2204                 $k = ord($c[(ord($c[$a]) + ord($c[$b])) % 256]);
2205                 $out .= chr(ord($text[$i]) ^ $k);
2206             }
2207     
2208             return $out;
2209         }
