2247         /**
2248          * set the encryption of the document
2249          * can be used to turn it on and/or set the passwords which it will have.
2250          * also the functions that the user will have are set here, such as print, modify, add
2251          *
2252          * @param string $userPass
2253          * @param string $ownerPass
2254          * @param array $pc
2255          */
2256         function setEncryption($userPass = '', $ownerPass = '', $pc = [])
2257         {
2258             $p = bindec("11000000");
2259     
2260             $options = ['print' => 4, 'modify' => 8, 'copy' => 16, 'add' => 32];
2261     
2262             foreach ($pc as $k => $v) {
2263                 if ($v && isset($options[$k])) {
2264                     $p += $options[$k];
2265                 } else {
2266                     if (isset($options[$v])) {
2267                         $p += $options[$v];
2268                     }
2269                 }
2270             }
2271     
2272             // implement encryption on the document
2273             if ($this->arc4_objnum == 0) {
2274                 // then the block does not exist already, add it.
2275                 $this->numObj++;
2276                 if (mb_strlen($ownerPass) == 0) {
2277                     $ownerPass = $userPass;
2278                 }
2279     
2280                 $this->o_encryption($this->numObj, 'new', ['user' => $userPass, 'owner' => $ownerPass, 'p' => $p]);
2281             }
2282         }

2291         /**
2292          * return the pdf stream as a string returned from the function
2293          *
2294          * @param bool $debug
2295          * @return string
2296          */
2297         function output($debug = false)
2298         {
2299             if ($debug) {
2300                 // turn compression off
2301                 $this->options['compression'] = false;
2302             }
2303     
2304             if ($this->javascript) {
2305                 $this->numObj++;
2306     
2307                 $js_id = $this->numObj;
2308                 $this->o_embedjs($js_id, 'new');
2309                 $this->o_javascript(++$this->numObj, 'new', $this->javascript);
2310     
2311                 $id = $this->catalogId;
2312     
2313                 $this->o_catalog($id, 'javascript', $js_id);
2314             }
2315     
2316             if ($this->fileIdentifier === '') {
2317                 $tmp = implode('', $this->objects[$this->infoObject]['info']);
2318                 $this->fileIdentifier = md5('DOMPDF' . __FILE__ . $tmp . microtime() . mt_rand());
2319             }
2320     
2321             if ($this->arc4_objnum) {
2322                 $this->o_encryption($this->arc4_objnum, 'keys');
2323                 $this->ARC4_init($this->encryptionKey);
2324             }
2325     
2326             $this->checkAllHere();
2327     
2328             $xref = [];
2329             $content = '%PDF-1.3';
2330             $pos = mb_strlen($content, '8bit');
2331     
2332             foreach ($this->objects as $k => $v) {
2333                 $tmp = 'o_' . $v['t'];
2334                 $cont = $this->$tmp($k, 'out');
2335                 $content .= $cont;
2336                 $xref[] = $pos + 1; //+1 to account for \n at the start of each object
2337                 $pos += mb_strlen($cont, '8bit');
2338             }
2339     
2340             $content .= "\nxref\n0 " . (count($xref) + 1) . "\n0000000000 65535 f \n";
2341     
2342             foreach ($xref as $p) {
2343                 $content .= str_pad($p, 10, "0", STR_PAD_LEFT) . " 00000 n \n";
2344             }
2345     
2346             $content .= "trailer\n<<\n" .
2347                 '/Size ' . (count($xref) + 1) . "\n" .
2348                 '/Root 1 0 R' . "\n" .
2349                 '/Info ' . $this->infoObject . " 0 R\n"
2350             ;
2351     
2352             // if encryption has been applied to this document then add the marker for this dictionary
2353             if ($this->arc4_objnum > 0) {
2354                 $content .= '/Encrypt ' . $this->arc4_objnum . " 0 R\n";
2355             }
2356     
2357             $content .= '/ID[<' . $this->fileIdentifier . '><' . $this->fileIdentifier . ">]\n";
2358     
2359             // account for \n added at start of xref table
2360             $pos++;
2361     
2362             $content .= ">>\nstartxref\n$pos\n%%EOF\n";
2363     
2364             return $content;
2365         }

2367         /**
2368          * initialize a new document
2369          * if this is called on an existing document results may be unpredictable, but the existing document would be lost at minimum
2370          * this function is called automatically by the constructor function
2371          *
2372          * @param array $pageSize
2373          */
2374         private function newDocument($pageSize = [0, 0, 612, 792])
2375         {
2376             $this->numObj = 0;
2377             $this->objects = [];
2378     
2379             $this->numObj++;
2380             $this->o_catalog($this->numObj, 'new');
2381     
2382             $this->numObj++;
2383             $this->o_outlines($this->numObj, 'new');
2384     
2385             $this->numObj++;
2386             $this->o_pages($this->numObj, 'new');
2387     
2388             $this->o_pages($this->numObj, 'mediaBox', $pageSize);
2389             $this->currentNode = 3;
2390     
2391             $this->numObj++;
2392             $this->o_procset($this->numObj, 'new');
2393     
2394             $this->numObj++;
2395             $this->o_info($this->numObj, 'new');
2396     
2397             $this->numObj++;
2398             $this->o_page($this->numObj, 'new');
2399     
2400             // need to store the first page id as there is no way to get it to the user during
2401             // startup
2402             $this->firstPageId = $this->currentContents;
2403         }

2405         /**
2406          * open the font file and return a php structure containing it.
2407          * first check if this one has been done before and saved in a form more suited to php
2408          * note that if a php serialized version does not exist it will try and make one, but will
2409          * require write access to the directory to do it... it is MUCH faster to have these serialized
2410          * files.
2411          *
2412          * @param $font
2413          */
2414         private function openFont($font)
2415         {
2416             // assume that $font contains the path and file but not the extension
2417             $name = basename($font);
2418             $dir = dirname($font) . '/';
2419     
2420             $fontcache = $this->fontcache;
2421             if ($fontcache == '') {
2422                 $fontcache = rtrim($dir, DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR."/\\");
2423             }
2424     
2425             //$name       filename without folder and extension of font metrics
2426             //$dir      folder of font metrics
2427             //$fontcache  folder of runtime created php serialized version of font metrics.
2428             //            If this is not given, the same folder as the font metrics will be used.
2429             //            Storing and reusing serialized versions improves speed much
2430     
2431             $this->addMessage("openFont: $font - $name");
2432     
2433             if (!$this->isUnicode || in_array(mb_strtolower(basename($name)), self::$coreFonts)) {
2434                 $metrics_name = "$name.afm";
2435             } else {
2436                 $metrics_name = "$name.ufm";
2437             }
2438     
2439             $cache_name = "$metrics_name.php";
2440             $this->addMessage("metrics: $metrics_name, cache: $cache_name");
2441     
2442             if (file_exists($fontcache . '/' . $cache_name)) {
2443                 $this->addMessage("openFont: php file exists $fontcache/$cache_name");
2444                 $this->fonts[$font] = require($fontcache . '/' . $cache_name);
2445     
2446                 if (!isset($this->fonts[$font]['_version_']) || $this->fonts[$font]['_version_'] != $this->fontcacheVersion) {
2447                     // if the font file is old, then clear it out and prepare for re-creation
2448                     $this->addMessage('openFont: clear out, make way for new version.');
2449                     $this->fonts[$font] = null;
2450                     unset($this->fonts[$font]);
2451                 }
2452             } else {
2453                 $old_cache_name = "php_$metrics_name";
2454                 if (file_exists($fontcache . '/' . $old_cache_name)) {
2455                     $this->addMessage(
2456                         "openFont: php file doesn't exist $fontcache/$cache_name, creating it from the old format"
2457                     );
2458                     $old_cache = file_get_contents($fontcache . '/' . $old_cache_name);
2459                     file_put_contents($fontcache . '/' . $cache_name, '<?php return ' . $old_cache . ';');
2460     
2461                     $this->openFont($font);
2462                     return;
2463                 }
2464             }
2465     
2466             if (!isset($this->fonts[$font]) && file_exists($dir . $metrics_name)) {
2467                 // then rebuild the php_<font>.afm file from the <font>.afm file
2468                 $this->addMessage("openFont: build php file from $dir$metrics_name");
2469                 $data = [];
2470     
2471                 // 20 => 'space'
2472                 $data['codeToName'] = [];
2473     
2474                 // Since we're not going to enable Unicode for the core fonts we need to use a font-based
2475                 // setting for Unicode support rather than a global setting.
2476                 $data['isUnicode'] = (strtolower(substr($metrics_name, -3)) !== 'afm');
2477     
2478                 $cidtogid = '';
2479                 if ($data['isUnicode']) {
2480                     $cidtogid = str_pad('', 256 * 256 * 2, "\x00");
2481                 }
2482     
2483                 $file = file($dir . $metrics_name);
2484     
2485                 foreach ($file as $rowA) {
2486                     $row = trim($rowA);
2487                     $pos = strpos($row, ' ');
2488     
2489                     if ($pos) {
2490                         // then there must be some keyword
2491                         $key = substr($row, 0, $pos);
2492                         switch ($key) {
2493                             case 'FontName':
2494                             case 'FullName':
2495                             case 'FamilyName':
2496                             case 'PostScriptName':
2497                             case 'Weight':
2498                             case 'ItalicAngle':
2499                             case 'IsFixedPitch':
2500                             case 'CharacterSet':
2501                             case 'UnderlinePosition':
2502                             case 'UnderlineThickness':
2503                             case 'Version':
2504                             case 'EncodingScheme':
2505                             case 'CapHeight':
2506                             case 'XHeight':
2507                             case 'Ascender':
2508                             case 'Descender':
2509                             case 'StdHW':
2510                             case 'StdVW':
2511                             case 'StartCharMetrics':
2512                             case 'FontHeightOffset': // OAR - Added so we can offset the height calculation of a Windows font.  Otherwise it's too big.
2513                                 $data[$key] = trim(substr($row, $pos));
2514                                 break;
2515     
2516                             case 'FontBBox':
2517                                 $data[$key] = explode(' ', trim(substr($row, $pos)));
2518                                 break;
2519     
2520                             //C 39 ; WX 222 ; N quoteright ; B 53 463 157 718 ;
2521                             case 'C': // Found in AFM files
2522                                 $bits = explode(';', trim($row));
2523                                 $dtmp = ['C' => null, 'N' => null, 'WX' => null, 'B' => []];
2524     
2525                                 foreach ($bits as $bit) {
2526                                     $bits2 = explode(' ', trim($bit));
2527                                     if (mb_strlen($bits2[0], '8bit') == 0) {
2528                                         continue;
2529                                     }
2530     
2531                                     if (count($bits2) > 2) {
2532                                         $dtmp[$bits2[0]] = [];
2533                                         for ($i = 1; $i < count($bits2); $i++) {
2534                                             $dtmp[$bits2[0]][] = $bits2[$i];
2535                                         }
2536                                     } else {
2537                                         if (count($bits2) == 2) {
2538                                             $dtmp[$bits2[0]] = $bits2[1];
2539                                         }
2540                                     }
2541                                 }
2542     
2543                                 $c = (int)$dtmp['C'];
2544                                 $n = $dtmp['N'];
2545                                 $width = floatval($dtmp['WX']);
2546     
2547                                 if ($c >= 0) {
2548                                     if (!ctype_xdigit($n) || $c != hexdec($n)) {
2549                                         $data['codeToName'][$c] = $n;
2550                                     }
2551                                     $data['C'][$c] = $width;
2552                                 } elseif (isset($n)) {
2553                                     $data['C'][$n] = $width;
2554                                 }
2555     
2556                                 if (!isset($data['MissingWidth']) && $c === -1 && $n === '.notdef') {
2557                                     $data['MissingWidth'] = $width;
2558                                 }
2559     
2560                                 break;
2561     
2562                             // U 827 ; WX 0 ; N squaresubnosp ; G 675 ;
2563                             case 'U': // Found in UFM files
2564                                 if (!$data['isUnicode']) {
2565                                     break;
2566                                 }
2567     
2568                                 $bits = explode(';', trim($row));
2569                                 $dtmp = ['G' => null, 'N' => null, 'U' => null, 'WX' => null];
2570     
2571                                 foreach ($bits as $bit) {
2572                                     $bits2 = explode(' ', trim($bit));
2573                                     if (mb_strlen($bits2[0], '8bit') === 0) {
2574                                         continue;
2575                                     }
2576     
2577                                     if (count($bits2) > 2) {
2578                                         $dtmp[$bits2[0]] = [];
2579                                         for ($i = 1; $i < count($bits2); $i++) {
2580                                             $dtmp[$bits2[0]][] = $bits2[$i];
2581                                         }
2582                                     } else {
2583                                         if (count($bits2) == 2) {
2584                                             $dtmp[$bits2[0]] = $bits2[1];
2585                                         }
2586                                     }
2587                                 }
2588     
2589                                 $c = (int)$dtmp['U'];
2590                                 $n = $dtmp['N'];
2591                                 $glyph = $dtmp['G'];
2592                                 $width = floatval($dtmp['WX']);
2593     
2594                                 if ($c >= 0) {
2595                                     // Set values in CID to GID map
2596                                     if ($c >= 0 && $c < 0xFFFF && $glyph) {
2597                                         $cidtogid[$c * 2] = chr($glyph >> 8);
2598                                         $cidtogid[$c * 2 + 1] = chr($glyph & 0xFF);
2599                                     }
2600     
2601                                     if (!ctype_xdigit($n) || $c != hexdec($n)) {
2602                                         $data['codeToName'][$c] = $n;
2603                                     }
2604                                     $data['C'][$c] = $width;
2605                                 } elseif (isset($n)) {
2606                                     $data['C'][$n] = $width;
2607                                 }
2608     
2609                                 if (!isset($data['MissingWidth']) && $c === -1 && $n === '.notdef') {
2610                                     $data['MissingWidth'] = $width;
2611                                 }
2612     
2613                                 break;
2614     
2615                             case 'KPX':
2616                                 break; // don't include them as they are not used yet
2617                                 //KPX Adieresis yacute -40
2618                                 /*$bits = explode(' ', trim($row));
2619                                 $data['KPX'][$bits[1]][$bits[2]] = $bits[3];
2620                                 break;*/
2621                         }
2622                     }
2623                 }
2624     
2625                 if ($this->compressionReady && $this->options['compression']) {
2626                     // then implement ZLIB based compression on CIDtoGID string
2627                     $data['CIDtoGID_Compressed'] = true;
2628                     $cidtogid = gzcompress($cidtogid, 6);
2629                 }
2630                 $data['CIDtoGID'] = base64_encode($cidtogid);
2631                 $data['_version_'] = $this->fontcacheVersion;
2632                 $this->fonts[$font] = $data;
2633     
2634                 //Because of potential trouble with php safe mode, expect that the folder already exists.
2635                 //If not existing, this will hit performance because of missing cached results.
2636                 if (is_dir($fontcache) && is_writable($fontcache)) {
2637                     file_put_contents($fontcache . '/' . $cache_name, '<?php return ' . var_export($data, true) . ';');
2638                 }
2639                 $data = null;
2640             }
2641     
2642             if (!isset($this->fonts[$font])) {
2643                 $this->addMessage("openFont: no font file found for $font. Do you need to run load_font.php?");
2644             }
2645     
2646             //pre_r($this->messages);
2647         }
2648     
2649         /**
2650          * if the font is not loaded then load it and make the required object
2651          * else just make it the current font
2652          * the encoding array can contain 'encoding'=> 'none','WinAnsiEncoding','MacRomanEncoding' or 'MacExpertEncoding'
2653          * note that encoding='none' will need to be used for symbolic fonts
2654          * and 'differences' => an array of mappings between numbers 0->255 and character names.
2655          *
2656          * @param $fontName
2657          * @param string $encoding
2658          * @param bool $set
2659          * @return int
2660          */
2661         function selectFont($fontName, $encoding = '', $set = true)
2662         {
2663             $ext = substr($fontName, -4);
2664             if ($ext === '.afm' || $ext === '.ufm') {
2665                 $fontName = substr($fontName, 0, mb_strlen($fontName) - 4);
2666             }
2667     
2668             if (!isset($this->fonts[$fontName])) {
2669                 $this->addMessage("selectFont: selecting - $fontName - $encoding, $set");
2670     
2671                 // load the file
2672                 $this->openFont($fontName);
2673     
2674                 if (isset($this->fonts[$fontName])) {
2675                     $this->numObj++;
2676                     $this->numFonts++;
2677     
2678                     $font = &$this->fonts[$fontName];
2679     
2680                     $name = basename($fontName);
2681                     $dir = dirname($fontName) . '/';
2682                     $options = ['name' => $name, 'fontFileName' => $fontName];
2683     
2684                     if (is_array($encoding)) {
2685                         // then encoding and differences might be set
2686                         if (isset($encoding['encoding'])) {
2687                             $options['encoding'] = $encoding['encoding'];
2688                         }
2689     
2690                         if (isset($encoding['differences'])) {
2691                             $options['differences'] = $encoding['differences'];
2692                         }
2693                     } else {
2694                         if (mb_strlen($encoding, '8bit')) {
2695                             // then perhaps only the encoding has been set
2696                             $options['encoding'] = $encoding;
2697                         }
2698                     }
2699     
2700                     $fontObj = $this->numObj;
2701                     $this->o_font($this->numObj, 'new', $options);
2702                     $font['fontNum'] = $this->numFonts;
2703     
2704                     // if this is a '.afm' font, and there is a '.pfa' file to go with it (as there
2705                     // should be for all non-basic fonts), then load it into an object and put the
2706                     // references into the font object
2707                     $basefile = $fontName;
2708     
2709                     $fbtype = '';
2710                     if (file_exists("$basefile.ttf")) {
2711                         $fbtype = 'ttf';
2712                     } elseif (file_exists("$basefile.TTF")) {
2713                         $fbtype = 'TTF';
2714                     } elseif (file_exists("$basefile.pfb")) {
2715                         $fbtype = 'pfb';
2716                     } elseif (file_exists("$basefile.PFB")) {
2717                         $fbtype = 'PFB';
2718                     }
2719     
2720                     $fbfile = "$basefile.$fbtype";
2721     
2722                     //      $pfbfile = substr($fontName,0,strlen($fontName)-4).'.pfb';
2723                     //      $ttffile = substr($fontName,0,strlen($fontName)-4).'.ttf';
2724                     $this->addMessage('selectFont: checking for - ' . $fbfile);
2725     
2726                     // OAR - I don't understand this old check
2727                     // if (substr($fontName, -4) ===  '.afm' &&  strlen($fbtype)) {
2728                     if ($fbtype) {
2729                         $adobeFontName = isset($font['PostScriptName']) ? $font['PostScriptName'] : $font['FontName'];
2730                         //        $fontObj = $this->numObj;
2731                         $this->addMessage("selectFont: adding font file - $fbfile - $adobeFontName");
2732     
2733                         // find the array of font widths, and put that into an object.
2734                         $firstChar = -1;
2735                         $lastChar = 0;
2736                         $widths = [];
2737                         $cid_widths = [];
2738     
2739                         foreach ($font['C'] as $num => $d) {
2740                             if (intval($num) > 0 || $num == '0') {
2741                                 if (!$font['isUnicode']) {
2742                                     // With Unicode, widths array isn't used
2743                                     if ($lastChar > 0 && $num > $lastChar + 1) {
2744                                         for ($i = $lastChar + 1; $i < $num; $i++) {
2745                                             $widths[] = 0;
2746                                         }
2747                                     }
2748                                 }
2749     
2750                                 $widths[] = $d;
2751     
2752                                 if ($font['isUnicode']) {
2753                                     $cid_widths[$num] = $d;
2754                                 }
2755     
2756                                 if ($firstChar == -1) {
2757                                     $firstChar = $num;
2758                                 }
2759     
2760                                 $lastChar = $num;
2761                             }
2762                         }
2763     
2764                         // also need to adjust the widths for the differences array
2765                         if (isset($options['differences'])) {
2766                             foreach ($options['differences'] as $charNum => $charName) {
2767                                 if ($charNum > $lastChar) {
2768                                     if (!$font['isUnicode']) {
2769                                         // With Unicode, widths array isn't used
2770                                         for ($i = $lastChar + 1; $i <= $charNum; $i++) {
2771                                             $widths[] = 0;
2772                                         }
2773                                     }
2774     
2775                                     $lastChar = $charNum;
2776                                 }
2777     
2778                                 if (isset($font['C'][$charName])) {
2779                                     $widths[$charNum - $firstChar] = $font['C'][$charName];
2780                                     if ($font['isUnicode']) {
2781                                         $cid_widths[$charName] = $font['C'][$charName];
2782                                     }
2783                                 }
2784                             }
2785                         }
2786     
2787                         if ($font['isUnicode']) {
2788                             $font['CIDWidths'] = $cid_widths;
2789                         }
2790     
2791                         $this->addMessage('selectFont: FirstChar = ' . $firstChar);
2792                         $this->addMessage('selectFont: LastChar = ' . $lastChar);
2793     
2794                         $widthid = -1;
2795     
2796                         if (!$font['isUnicode']) {
2797                             // With Unicode, widths array isn't used
2798     
2799                             $this->numObj++;
2800                             $this->o_contents($this->numObj, 'new', 'raw');
2801                             $this->objects[$this->numObj]['c'] .= '[' . implode(' ', $widths) . ']';
2802                             $widthid = $this->numObj;
2803                         }
2804     
2805                         $missing_width = 500;
2806                         $stemV = 70;
2807     
2808                         if (isset($font['MissingWidth'])) {
2809                             $missing_width = $font['MissingWidth'];
2810                         }
2811                         if (isset($font['StdVW'])) {
2812                             $stemV = $font['StdVW'];
2813                         } else {
2814                             if (isset($font['Weight']) && preg_match('!(bold|black)!i', $font['Weight'])) {
2815                                 $stemV = 120;
2816                             }
2817                         }
2818     
2819                         // load the pfb file, and put that into an object too.
2820                         // note that pdf supports only binary format type 1 font files, though there is a
2821                         // simple utility to convert them from pfa to pfb.
2822                         // FIXME: should we move font subset creation to CPDF::output? See notes in issue #750.
2823                         if (!$this->isUnicode || strtolower($fbtype) !== 'ttf' || empty($this->stringSubsets)) {
2824                             $data = file_get_contents($fbfile);
2825                         } else {
2826                             $this->stringSubsets[$fontName][] = 32; // Force space if not in yet
2827     
2828                             $subset = $this->stringSubsets[$fontName];
2829                             sort($subset);
2830     
2831                             // Load font
2832                             $font_obj = Font::load($fbfile);
2833                             $font_obj->parse();
2834     
2835                             // Define subset
2836                             $font_obj->setSubset($subset);
2837                             $font_obj->reduce();
2838     
2839                             // Write new font
2840                             $tmp_name = $this->tmp . "/" . basename($fbfile) . ".tmp." . uniqid();
2841                             touch($tmp_name);
2842                             $font_obj->open($tmp_name, BinaryStream::modeReadWrite);
2843                             $font_obj->encode(["OS/2"]);
2844                             $font_obj->close();
2845     
2846                             // Parse the new font to get cid2gid and widths
2847                             $font_obj = Font::load($tmp_name);
2848     
2849                             // Find Unicode char map table
2850                             $subtable = null;
2851                             foreach ($font_obj->getData("cmap", "subtables") as $_subtable) {
2852                                 if ($_subtable["platformID"] == 0 || $_subtable["platformID"] == 3 && $_subtable["platformSpecificID"] == 1) {
2853                                     $subtable = $_subtable;
2854                                     break;
2855                                 }
2856                             }
2857     
2858                             if ($subtable) {
2859                                 $glyphIndexArray = $subtable["glyphIndexArray"];
2860                                 $hmtx = $font_obj->getData("hmtx");
2861     
2862                                 unset($glyphIndexArray[0xFFFF]);
2863     
2864                                 $cidtogid = str_pad('', max(array_keys($glyphIndexArray)) * 2 + 1, "\x00");
2865                                 $font['CIDWidths'] = [];
2866                                 foreach ($glyphIndexArray as $cid => $gid) {
2867                                     if ($cid >= 0 && $cid < 0xFFFF && $gid) {
2868                                         $cidtogid[$cid * 2] = chr($gid >> 8);
2869                                         $cidtogid[$cid * 2 + 1] = chr($gid & 0xFF);
2870                                     }
2871     
2872                                     $width = $font_obj->normalizeFUnit(isset($hmtx[$gid]) ? $hmtx[$gid][0] : $hmtx[0][0]);
2873                                     $font['CIDWidths'][$cid] = $width;
2874                                 }
2875     
2876                                 $font['CIDtoGID'] = base64_encode(gzcompress($cidtogid));
2877                                 $font['CIDtoGID_Compressed'] = true;
2878     
2879                                 $data = file_get_contents($tmp_name);
2880                             } else {
2881                                 $data = file_get_contents($fbfile);
2882                             }
2883     
2884                             $font_obj->close();
2885                             unlink($tmp_name);
2886                         }
2887     
2888                         // create the font descriptor
2889                         $this->numObj++;
2890                         $fontDescriptorId = $this->numObj;
2891     
2892                         $this->numObj++;
2893                         $pfbid = $this->numObj;
2894     
2895                         // determine flags (more than a little flakey, hopefully will not matter much)
2896                         $flags = 0;
2897     
2898                         if ($font['ItalicAngle'] != 0) {
2899                             $flags += pow(2, 6);
2900                         }
2901     
2902                         if ($font['IsFixedPitch'] === 'true') {
2903                             $flags += 1;
2904                         }
2905     
2906                         $flags += pow(2, 5); // assume non-sybolic
2907                         $list = [
2908                             'Ascent'       => 'Ascender',
2909                             'CapHeight'    => 'Ascender', //FIXME: php-font-lib is not grabbing this value, so we'll fake it and use the Ascender value // 'CapHeight'
2910                             'MissingWidth' => 'MissingWidth',
2911                             'Descent'      => 'Descender',
2912                             'FontBBox'     => 'FontBBox',
2913                             'ItalicAngle'  => 'ItalicAngle'
2914                         ];
2915                         $fdopt = [
2916                             'Flags'    => $flags,
2917                             'FontName' => $adobeFontName,
2918                             'StemV'    => $stemV
2919                         ];
2920     
2921                         foreach ($list as $k => $v) {
2922                             if (isset($font[$v])) {
2923                                 $fdopt[$k] = $font[$v];
2924                             }
2925                         }
2926     
2927                         if (strtolower($fbtype) === 'pfb') {
2928                             $fdopt['FontFile'] = $pfbid;
2929                         } elseif (strtolower($fbtype) === 'ttf') {
2930                             $fdopt['FontFile2'] = $pfbid;
2931                         }
2932     
2933                         $this->o_fontDescriptor($fontDescriptorId, 'new', $fdopt);
2934     
2935                         // embed the font program
2936                         $this->o_contents($this->numObj, 'new');
2937                         $this->objects[$pfbid]['c'] .= $data;
2938     
2939                         // determine the cruicial lengths within this file
2940                         if (strtolower($fbtype) === 'pfb') {
2941                             $l1 = strpos($data, 'eexec') + 6;
2942                             $l2 = strpos($data, '00000000') - $l1;
2943                             $l3 = mb_strlen($data, '8bit') - $l2 - $l1;
2944                             $this->o_contents(
2945                                 $this->numObj,
2946                                 'add',
2947                                 ['Length1' => $l1, 'Length2' => $l2, 'Length3' => $l3]
2948                             );
2949                         } elseif (strtolower($fbtype) == 'ttf') {
2950                             $l1 = mb_strlen($data, '8bit');
2951                             $this->o_contents($this->numObj, 'add', ['Length1' => $l1]);
2952                         }
2953     
2954                         // tell the font object about all this new stuff
2955                         $tmp = [
2956                             'BaseFont'       => $adobeFontName,
2957                             'MissingWidth'   => $missing_width,
2958                             'Widths'         => $widthid,
2959                             'FirstChar'      => $firstChar,
2960                             'LastChar'       => $lastChar,
2961                             'FontDescriptor' => $fontDescriptorId
2962                         ];
2963     
2964                         if (strtolower($fbtype) === 'ttf') {
2965                             $tmp['SubType'] = 'TrueType';
2966                         }
2967     
2968                         $this->addMessage("adding extra info to font.($fontObj)");
2969     
2970                         foreach ($tmp as $fk => $fv) {
2971                             $this->addMessage("$fk : $fv");
2972                         }
2973     
2974                         $this->o_font($fontObj, 'add', $tmp);
2975                     } else {
2976                         $this->addMessage(
2977                             'selectFont: pfb or ttf file not found, ok if this is one of the 14 standard fonts'
2978                         );
2979                     }
2980     
2981                     // also set the differences here, note that this means that these will take effect only the
2982                     //first time that a font is selected, else they are ignored
2983                     if (isset($options['differences'])) {
2984                         $font['differences'] = $options['differences'];
2985                     }
2986                 }
2987             }
2988     
2989             if ($set && isset($this->fonts[$fontName])) {
2990                 // so if for some reason the font was not set in the last one then it will not be selected
2991                 $this->currentBaseFont = $fontName;
2992     
2993                 // the next lines mean that if a new font is selected, then the current text state will be
2994                 // applied to it as well.
2995                 $this->currentFont = $this->currentBaseFont;
2996                 $this->currentFontNum = $this->fonts[$this->currentFont]['fontNum'];
2997     
2998                 //$this->setCurrentFont();
2999             }
3000     
3001             return $this->currentFontNum;
3002             //return $this->numObj;
3003         }

3061         /**
3062          * sets the color for fill operations
3063          *
3064          * @param $color
3065          * @param bool $force
3066          */
3067         function setColor($color, $force = false)
3068         {
3069             $new_color = [$color[0], $color[1], $color[2], isset($color[3]) ? $color[3] : null];
3070     
3071             if (!$force && $this->currentColor == $new_color) {
3072                 return;
3073             }
3074     
3075             if (isset($new_color[3])) {
3076                 $this->currentColor = $new_color;
3077                 $this->addContent(vsprintf("\n%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F k", $this->currentColor));
3078             } else {
3079                 if (isset($new_color[2])) {
3080                     $this->currentColor = $new_color;
3081                     $this->addContent(vsprintf("\n%.3F %.3F %.3F rg", $this->currentColor));
3082                 }
3083             }
3084         }

3127          *
3128          * @param $parameters
3129          */
3130         function setGraphicsState($parameters)
3131         {
3132             // Create a new graphics state object if necessary
3133             if (($gstate = array_search($parameters, $this->gstates)) === false) {
3134                 $this->numObj++;
3135                 $this->o_extGState($this->numObj, 'new', $parameters);
3136                 $gstate = $this->numStates;
3137                 $this->gstates[$gstate] = $parameters;
3138             }
3139             $this->addContent("\n/GS$gstate gs");

3142         /**
3143          * Set current blend mode & opacity for lines.
3144          *
3145          * Valid blend modes are:
3146          *
3147          * Normal, Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Darken, Lighten,
3148          * ColorDogde, ColorBurn, HardLight, SoftLight, Difference,
3149          * Exclusion
3150          *
3151          * @param string $mode    the blend mode to use
3152          * @param float  $opacity 0.0 fully transparent, 1.0 fully opaque
3153          */
3154         function setLineTransparency($mode, $opacity)
3155         {
3156             static $blend_modes = [
3157                 "Normal",
3158                 "Multiply",
3159                 "Screen",
3160                 "Overlay",
3161                 "Darken",
3162                 "Lighten",
3163                 "ColorDogde",
3164                 "ColorBurn",
3165                 "HardLight",
3166                 "SoftLight",
3167                 "Difference",
3168                 "Exclusion"
3169             ];
3170     
3171             if (!in_array($mode, $blend_modes)) {
3172                 $mode = "Normal";
3173             }
3174     
3175             // Only create a new graphics state if required
3176             if ($mode === $this->currentLineTransparency["mode"] &&
3177                 $opacity == $this->currentLineTransparency["opacity"]
3178             ) {
3179                 return;
3180             }
3181     
3182             $this->currentLineTransparency["mode"] = $mode;
3183             $this->currentLineTransparency["opacity"] = $opacity;
3184     
3185             $options = [
3186                 "BM" => "/$mode",
3187                 "CA" => (float)$opacity
3188             ];
3189     
3190             $this->setGraphicsState($options);
3191         }

3367         /**

3369          * note that the part and filled ellipse are just special cases of this function
3370          *
3371          * draws an ellipse in the current line style
3372          * centered at $x0,$y0, radii $r1,$r2
3373          * if $r2 is not set, then a circle is drawn
3374          * from $astart to $afinish, measured in degrees, running anti-clockwise from the right hand side of the ellipse.
3375          * nSeg is not allowed to be less than 2, as this will simply draw a line (and will even draw a
3376          * pretty crappy shape at 2, as we are approximating with bezier curves.
3377          *
3378          * @param $x0
3379          * @param $y0
3380          * @param $r1
3381          * @param int $r2
3382          * @param int $angle
3383          * @param int $nSeg
3384          * @param int $astart
3385          * @param int $afinish
3386          * @param bool $close
3387          * @param bool $fill
3388          * @param bool $stroke
3389          * @param bool $incomplete
3390          */
3391         function ellipse(
3392             $x0,
3393             $y0,
3394             $r1,
3395             $r2 = 0,
3396             $angle = 0,
3397             $nSeg = 8,
3398             $astart = 0,
3399             $afinish = 360,
3400             $close = true,
3401             $fill = false,
3402             $stroke = true,
3403             $incomplete = false
3404         ) {
3405             if ($r1 == 0) {
3406                 return;
3407             }
3408     
3409             if ($r2 == 0) {
3410                 $r2 = $r1;
3411             }
3412     
3413             if ($nSeg < 2) {
3414                 $nSeg = 2;
3415             }
3416     
3417             $astart = deg2rad((float)$astart);
3418             $afinish = deg2rad((float)$afinish);
3419             $totalAngle = $afinish - $astart;
3420     
3421             $dt = $totalAngle / $nSeg;
3422             $dtm = $dt / 3;
3423     
3424             if ($angle != 0) {
3425                 $a = -1 * deg2rad((float)$angle);
3426     
3427                 $this->addContent(
3428                     sprintf("\n q %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F cm", cos($a), -sin($a), sin($a), cos($a), $x0, $y0)
3429                 );
3430     
3431                 $x0 = 0;
3432                 $y0 = 0;
3433             }
3434     
3435             $t1 = $astart;
3436             $a0 = $x0 + $r1 * cos($t1);
3437             $b0 = $y0 + $r2 * sin($t1);
3438             $c0 = -$r1 * sin($t1);
3439             $d0 = $r2 * cos($t1);
3440     
3441             if (!$incomplete) {
3442                 $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F m ", $a0, $b0));
3443             }
3444     
3445             for ($i = 1; $i <= $nSeg; $i++) {
3446                 // draw this bit of the total curve
3447                 $t1 = $i * $dt + $astart;
3448                 $a1 = $x0 + $r1 * cos($t1);
3449                 $b1 = $y0 + $r2 * sin($t1);
3450                 $c1 = -$r1 * sin($t1);
3451                 $d1 = $r2 * cos($t1);
3452     
3453                 $this->addContent(
3454                     sprintf(
3455                         "\n%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F c",
3456                         ($a0 + $c0 * $dtm),
3457                         ($b0 + $d0 * $dtm),
3458                         ($a1 - $c1 * $dtm),
3459                         ($b1 - $d1 * $dtm),
3460                         $a1,
3461                         $b1
3462                     )
3463                 );
3464     
3465                 $a0 = $a1;
3466                 $b0 = $b1;
3467                 $c0 = $c1;
3468                 $d0 = $d1;
3469             }
3470     
3471             if (!$incomplete) {
3472                 if ($fill) {
3473                     $this->addContent(' f');
3474                 }
3475     
3476                 if ($stroke) {
3477                     if ($close) {
3478                         $this->addContent(' s'); // small 's' signifies closing the path as well
3479                     } else {
3480                         $this->addContent(' S');
3481                     }
3482                 }
3483             }
3484     
3485             if ($angle != 0) {
3486                 $this->addContent(' Q');
3487             }
3488         }
3489     
3490         /**
3491          * this sets the line drawing style.
3492          * width, is the thickness of the line in user units
3493          * cap is the type of cap to put on the line, values can be 'butt','round','square'
3494          *    where the diffference between 'square' and 'butt' is that 'square' projects a flat end past the
3495          *    end of the line.
3496          * join can be 'miter', 'round', 'bevel'
3497          * dash is an array which sets the dash pattern, is a series of length values, which are the lengths of the
3498          *   on and off dashes.
3499          *   (2) represents 2 on, 2 off, 2 on , 2 off ...
3500          *   (2,1) is 2 on, 1 off, 2 on, 1 off.. etc
3501          * phase is a modifier on the dash pattern which is used to shift the point at which the pattern starts.
3502          *
3503          * @param int $width
3504          * @param string $cap
3505          * @param string $join
3506          * @param string $dash
3507          * @param int $phase
3508          */
3509         function setLineStyle($width = 1, $cap = '', $join = '', $dash = '', $phase = 0)
3510         {
3511             // this is quite inefficient in that it sets all the parameters whenever 1 is changed, but will fix another day
3512             $string = '';
3513     
3514             if ($width > 0) {
3515                 $string .= "$width w";
3516             }
3517     
3518             $ca = ['butt' => 0, 'round' => 1, 'square' => 2];
3519     
3520             if (isset($ca[$cap])) {
3521                 $string .= " $ca[$cap] J";
3522             }
3523     
3524             $ja = ['miter' => 0, 'round' => 1, 'bevel' => 2];
3525     
3526             if (isset($ja[$join])) {
3527                 $string .= " $ja[$join] j";
3528             }
3529     
3530             if (is_array($dash)) {
3531                 $string .= ' [ ' . implode(' ', $dash) . " ] $phase d";
3532             }
3533     
3534             $this->currentLineStyle = $string;
3535             $this->addContent("\n$string");
3536         }
3537     
3538         /**
3539          * draw a polygon, the syntax for this is similar to the GD polygon command
3540          *
3541          * @param $p
3542          * @param $np
3543          * @param bool $f
3544          */
3545         function polygon($p, $np, $f = false)
3546         {
3547             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F m ", $p[0], $p[1]));
3548     
3549             for ($i = 2; $i < $np * 2; $i = $i + 2) {
3550                 $this->addContent(sprintf("%.3F %.3F l ", $p[$i], $p[$i + 1]));
3551             }
3552     
3553             if ($f) {
3554                 $this->addContent(' f');
3555             } else {
3556                 $this->addContent(' S');
3557             }
3558         }

3639         /**
3640          * draw a clipping rectangle, all the elements added after this will be clipped
3641          *
3642          * @param $x1
3643          * @param $y1
3644          * @param $width
3645          * @param $height
3646          */
3647         function clippingRectangle($x1, $y1, $width, $height)
3648         {
3649             $this->save();
3650             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re W n", $x1, $y1, $width, $height));
3651         }
3652     
3653         /**
3654          * draw a clipping rounded rectangle, all the elements added after this will be clipped
3655          *
3656          * @param $x1
3657          * @param $y1
3658          * @param $w
3659          * @param $h
3660          * @param $rTL
3661          * @param $rTR
3662          * @param $rBR
3663          * @param $rBL
3664          */
3665         function clippingRectangleRounded($x1, $y1, $w, $h, $rTL, $rTR, $rBR, $rBL)
3666         {
3667             $this->save();
3668     
3669             // start: top edge, left end
3670             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F m ", $x1, $y1 - $rTL + $h));
3671     
3672             // line: bottom edge, left end
3673             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F l ", $x1, $y1 + $rBL));
3674     
3675             // curve: bottom-left corner
3676             $this->ellipse($x1 + $rBL, $y1 + $rBL, $rBL, 0, 0, 8, 180, 270, false, false, false, true);
3677     
3678             // line: right edge, bottom end
3679             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F l ", $x1 + $w - $rBR, $y1));
3680     
3681             // curve: bottom-right corner
3682             $this->ellipse($x1 + $w - $rBR, $y1 + $rBR, $rBR, 0, 0, 8, 270, 360, false, false, false, true);
3683     
3684             // line: right edge, top end
3685             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F l ", $x1 + $w, $y1 + $h - $rTR));
3686     
3687             // curve: bottom-right corner
3688             $this->ellipse($x1 + $w - $rTR, $y1 + $h - $rTR, $rTR, 0, 0, 8, 0, 90, false, false, false, true);
3689     
3690             // line: bottom edge, right end
3691             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F l ", $x1 + $rTL, $y1 + $h));
3692     
3693             // curve: top-right corner
3694             $this->ellipse($x1 + $rTL, $y1 + $h - $rTL, $rTL, 0, 0, 8, 90, 180, false, false, false, true);
3695     
3696             // line: top edge, left end
3697             $this->addContent(sprintf("\n%.3F %.3F l ", $x1 + $rBL, $y1));
3698     
3699             // Close & clip
3700             $this->addContent(" W n");
3701         }

3703         /**
3704          * ends the last clipping shape
3705          */
3706         function clippingEnd()
3707         {
3708             $this->restore();
3709         }

3711         /**
3712          * scale
3713          *
3714          * @param float $s_x scaling factor for width as percent
3715          * @param float $s_y scaling factor for height as percent
3716          * @param float $x   Origin abscissa
3717          * @param float $y   Origin ordinate
3718          */
3719         function scale($s_x, $s_y, $x, $y)
3720         {
3721             $y = $this->currentPageSize["height"] - $y;
3722     
3723             $tm = [
3724                 $s_x,
3725                 0,
3726                 0,
3727                 $s_y,
3728                 $x * (1 - $s_x),
3729                 $y * (1 - $s_y)
3730             ];
3731     
3732             $this->transform($tm);
3733         }
3734     
3735         /**
3736          * translate
3737          *
3738          * @param float $t_x movement to the right
3739          * @param float $t_y movement to the bottom
3740          */
3741         function translate($t_x, $t_y)
3742         {
3743             $tm = [
3744                 1,
3745                 0,
3746                 0,
3747                 1,
3748                 $t_x,
3749                 -$t_y
3750             ];
3751     
3752             $this->transform($tm);
3753         }
3754     
3755         /**
3756          * rotate
3757          *
3758          * @param float $angle angle in degrees for counter-clockwise rotation
3759          * @param float $x     Origin abscissa
3760          * @param float $y     Origin ordinate
3761          */
3762         function rotate($angle, $x, $y)
3763         {
3764             $y = $this->currentPageSize["height"] - $y;
3765     
3766             $a = deg2rad($angle);
3767             $cos_a = cos($a);
3768             $sin_a = sin($a);
3769     
3770             $tm = [
3771                 $cos_a,
3772                 -$sin_a,
3773                 $sin_a,
3774                 $cos_a,
3775                 $x - $sin_a * $y - $cos_a * $x,
3776                 $y - $cos_a * $y + $sin_a * $x,
3777             ];
3778     
3779             $this->transform($tm);
3780         }
3781     
3782         /**
3783          * skew
3784          *
3785          * @param float $angle_x
3786          * @param float $angle_y
3787          * @param float $x Origin abscissa
3788          * @param float $y Origin ordinate
3789          */
3790         function skew($angle_x, $angle_y, $x, $y)
3791         {
3792             $y = $this->currentPageSize["height"] - $y;
3793     
3794             $tan_x = tan(deg2rad($angle_x));
3795             $tan_y = tan(deg2rad($angle_y));
3796     
3797             $tm = [
3798                 1,
3799                 -$tan_y,
3800                 -$tan_x,
3801                 1,
3802                 $tan_x * $y,
3803                 $tan_y * $x,
3804             ];
3805     
3806             $this->transform($tm);
3807         }
3808     
3809         /**
3810          * apply graphic transformations
3811          *
3812          * @param array $tm transformation matrix
3813          */
3814         function transform($tm)
3815         {
3816             $this->addContent(vsprintf("\n %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F cm", $tm));
3817         }
3818     
3819         /**
3820          * add a new page to the document
3821          * this also makes the new page the current active object
3822          *
3823          * @param int $insert
3824          * @param int $id
3825          * @param string $pos
3826          * @return int
3827          */
3828         function newPage($insert = 0, $id = 0, $pos = 'after')
3829         {
3830             // if there is a state saved, then go up the stack closing them
3831             // then on the new page, re-open them with the right setings
3832     
3833             if ($this->nStateStack) {
3834                 for ($i = $this->nStateStack; $i >= 1; $i--) {
3835                     $this->restoreState($i);
3836                 }
3837             }
3838     
3839             $this->numObj++;
3840     
3841             if ($insert) {
3842                 // the id from the ezPdf class is the id of the contents of the page, not the page object itself
3843                 // query that object to find the parent
3844                 $rid = $this->objects[$id]['onPage'];
3845                 $opt = ['rid' => $rid, 'pos' => $pos];
3846                 $this->o_page($this->numObj, 'new', $opt);
3847             } else {
3848                 $this->o_page($this->numObj, 'new');
3849             }
3850     
3851             // if there is a stack saved, then put that onto the page
3852             if ($this->nStateStack) {
3853                 for ($i = 1; $i <= $this->nStateStack; $i++) {
3854                     $this->saveState($i);
3855                 }
3856             }
3857     
3858             // and if there has been a stroke or fill color set, then transfer them
3859             if (isset($this->currentColor)) {
3860                 $this->setColor($this->currentColor, true);
3861             }
3862     
3863             if (isset($this->currentStrokeColor)) {
3864                 $this->setStrokeColor($this->currentStrokeColor, true);
3865             }
3866     
3867             // if there is a line style set, then put this in too
3868             if (mb_strlen($this->currentLineStyle, '8bit')) {
3869                 $this->addContent("\n$this->currentLineStyle");
3870             }
3871     
3872             // the call to the o_page object set currentContents to the present page, so this can be returned as the page id
3873             return $this->currentContents;
3874         }
3875     
3876         /**
3877          * Streams the PDF to the client.
3878          *
3879          * @param string $filename The filename to present to the client.
3880          * @param array $options Associative array: 'compress' => 1 or 0 (default 1); 'Attachment' => 1 or 0 (default 1).
3881          */
3882         function stream($filename = "document.pdf", $options = [])
3883         {
3884             if (headers_sent()) {
3885                 die("Unable to stream pdf: headers already sent");
3886             }
3887     
3888             if (!isset($options["compress"])) $options["compress"] = true;
3889             if (!isset($options["Attachment"])) $options["Attachment"] = true;
3890     
3891             $debug = !$options['compress'];
3892             $tmp = ltrim($this->output($debug));
3893     
3894             header("Cache-Control: private");
3895             header("Content-Type: application/pdf");
3896             header("Content-Length: " . mb_strlen($tmp, "8bit"));
3897     
3898             $filename = str_replace(["\n", "'"], "", basename($filename, ".pdf")) . ".pdf";
3899             $attachment = $options["Attachment"] ? "attachment" : "inline";
3900     
3901             $encoding = mb_detect_encoding($filename);
3902             $fallbackfilename = mb_convert_encoding($filename, "ISO-8859-1", $encoding);
3903             $fallbackfilename = str_replace("\"", "", $fallbackfilename);
3904             $encodedfilename = rawurlencode($filename);
3905     
3906             $contentDisposition = "Content-Disposition: $attachment; filename=\"$fallbackfilename\"";
3907             if ($fallbackfilename !== $filename) {
3908                 $contentDisposition .= "; filename*=UTF-8''$encodedfilename";
3909             }
3910             header($contentDisposition);
3911     
3912             echo $tmp;
3913             flush();
3914         }
3915     
3916         /**
3917          * return the height in units of the current font in the given size
3918          *
3919          * @param $size
3920          * @return float|int
3921          */
3922         function getFontHeight($size)
3923         {
3924             if (!$this->numFonts) {
3925                 $this->selectFont($this->defaultFont);
3926             }
3927     
3928             $font = $this->fonts[$this->currentFont];
3929     
3930             // for the current font, and the given size, what is the height of the font in user units
3931             if (isset($font['Ascender']) && isset($font['Descender'])) {
3932                 $h = $font['Ascender'] - $font['Descender'];
3933             } else {
3934                 $h = $font['FontBBox'][3] - $font['FontBBox'][1];
3935             }
3936     
3937             // have to adjust by a font offset for Windows fonts.  unfortunately it looks like
3938             // the bounding box calculations are wrong and I don't know why.
3939             if (isset($font['FontHeightOffset'])) {
3940                 // For CourierNew from Windows this needs to be -646 to match the
3941                 // Adobe native Courier font.
3942                 //
3943                 // For FreeMono from GNU this needs to be -337 to match the
3944                 // Courier font.
3945                 //
3946                 // Both have been added manually to the .afm and .ufm files.
3947                 $h += (int)$font['FontHeightOffset'];
3948             }
3949     
3950             return $size * $h / 1000;
3951         }
3952     
3953         /**
3954          * @param $size
3955          * @return float|int
3956          */
3957         function getFontXHeight($size)
3958         {
3959             if (!$this->numFonts) {
3960                 $this->selectFont($this->defaultFont);
3961             }
3962     
3963             $font = $this->fonts[$this->currentFont];
3964     
3965             // for the current font, and the given size, what is the height of the font in user units
3966             if (isset($font['XHeight'])) {
3967                 $xh = $font['Ascender'] - $font['Descender'];
3968             } else {
3969                 $xh = $this->getFontHeight($size) / 2;
3970             }
3971     
3972             return $size * $xh / 1000;
3973         }
3974     
3975         /**
3976          * return the font descender, this will normally return a negative number
3977          * if you add this number to the baseline, you get the level of the bottom of the font
3978          * it is in the pdf user units
3979          *
3980          * @param $size
3981          * @return float|int
3982          */
3983         function getFontDescender($size)
3984         {
3985             // note that this will most likely return a negative value
3986             if (!$this->numFonts) {
3987                 $this->selectFont($this->defaultFont);
3988             }
3989     
3990             //$h = $this->fonts[$this->currentFont]['FontBBox'][1];
3991             $h = $this->fonts[$this->currentFont]['Descender'];
3992     
3993             return $size * $h / 1000;
3994         }

3996         /**
3997          * filter the text, this is applied to all text just before being inserted into the pdf document
3998          * it escapes the various things that need to be escaped, and so on
3999          *
4000          * @access private
4001          *
4002          * @param $text
4003          * @param bool $bom
4004          * @param bool $convert_encoding
4005          * @return string
4006          */
4007         function filterText($text, $bom = true, $convert_encoding = true)
4008         {
4009             if (!$this->numFonts) {
4010                 $this->selectFont($this->defaultFont);
4011             }
4012     
4013             if ($convert_encoding) {
4014                 $cf = $this->currentFont;
4015                 if (isset($this->fonts[$cf]) && $this->fonts[$cf]['isUnicode']) {
4016                     $text = $this->utf8toUtf16BE($text, $bom);
4017                 } else {
4018                     //$text = html_entity_decode($text, ENT_QUOTES);
4019                     $text = mb_convert_encoding($text, self::$targetEncoding, 'UTF-8');
4020                 }
4021             } else if ($bom) {
4022                 $text = $this->utf8toUtf16BE($text, $bom);
4023             }
4024     
4025             // the chr(13) substitution fixes a bug seen in TCPDF (bug #1421290)
4026             return strtr($text, [')' => '\\)', '(' => '\\(', '\\' => '\\\\', chr(13) => '\r']);
4027         }
4028     
4029         /**
4030          * return array containing codepoints (UTF-8 character values) for the
4031          * string passed in.
4032          *
4033          * based on the excellent TCPDF code by Nicola Asuni and the
4034          * RFC for UTF-8 at http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc3629.html
4035          *
4036          * @access private
4037          * @author Orion Richardson
4038          * @since  January 5, 2008
4039          *
4040          * @param string $text UTF-8 string to process
4041          *
4042          * @return array UTF-8 codepoints array for the string
4043          */
4044         function utf8toCodePointsArray(&$text)
4045         {
4046             $length = mb_strlen($text, '8bit'); // http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-strlen.php#77040
4047             $unicode = []; // array containing unicode values
4048             $bytes = []; // array containing single character byte sequences
4049             $numbytes = 1; // number of octets needed to represent the UTF-8 character
4050     
4051             for ($i = 0; $i < $length; $i++) {
4052                 $c = ord($text[$i]); // get one string character at time
4053                 if (count($bytes) === 0) { // get starting octect
4054                     if ($c <= 0x7F) {
4055                         $unicode[] = $c; // use the character "as is" because is ASCII
4056                         $numbytes = 1;
4057                     } elseif (($c >> 0x05) === 0x06) { // 2 bytes character (0x06 = 110 BIN)
4058                         $bytes[] = ($c - 0xC0) << 0x06;
4059                         $numbytes = 2;
4060                     } elseif (($c >> 0x04) === 0x0E) { // 3 bytes character (0x0E = 1110 BIN)
4061                         $bytes[] = ($c - 0xE0) << 0x0C;
4062                         $numbytes = 3;
4063                     } elseif (($c >> 0x03) === 0x1E) { // 4 bytes character (0x1E = 11110 BIN)
4064                         $bytes[] = ($c - 0xF0) << 0x12;
4065                         $numbytes = 4;
4066                     } else {
4067                         // use replacement character for other invalid sequences
4068                         $unicode[] = 0xFFFD;
4069                         $bytes = [];
4070                         $numbytes = 1;
4071                     }
4072                 } elseif (($c >> 0x06) === 0x02) { // bytes 2, 3 and 4 must start with 0x02 = 10 BIN
4073                     $bytes[] = $c - 0x80;
4074                     if (count($bytes) === $numbytes) {
4075                         // compose UTF-8 bytes to a single unicode value
4076                         $c = $bytes[0];
4077                         for ($j = 1; $j < $numbytes; $j++) {
4078                             $c += ($bytes[$j] << (($numbytes - $j - 1) * 0x06));
4079                         }
4080                         if ((($c >= 0xD800) and ($c <= 0xDFFF)) or ($c >= 0x10FFFF)) {
4081                             // The definition of UTF-8 prohibits encoding character numbers between
4082                             // U+D800 and U+DFFF, which are reserved for use with the UTF-16
4083                             // encoding form (as surrogate pairs) and do not directly represent
4084                             // characters.
4085                             $unicode[] = 0xFFFD; // use replacement character
4086                         } else {
4087                             $unicode[] = $c; // add char to array
4088                         }
4089                         // reset data for next char
4090                         $bytes = [];
4091                         $numbytes = 1;
4092                     }
4093                 } else {
4094                     // use replacement character for other invalid sequences
4095                     $unicode[] = 0xFFFD;
4096                     $bytes = [];
4097                     $numbytes = 1;
4098                 }
4099             }
4100     
4101             return $unicode;
4102         }
4103     
4104         /**
4105          * convert UTF-8 to UTF-16 with an additional byte order marker
4106          * at the front if required.
4107          *
4108          * based on the excellent TCPDF code by Nicola Asuni and the
4109          * RFC for UTF-8 at http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc3629.html
4110          *
4111          * @access private
4112          * @author Orion Richardson
4113          * @since  January 5, 2008
4114          *
4115          * @param string  $text UTF-8 string to process
4116          * @param boolean $bom  whether to add the byte order marker
4117          *
4118          * @return string UTF-16 result string
4119          */
4120         function utf8toUtf16BE(&$text, $bom = true)
4121         {
4122             $out = $bom ? "\xFE\xFF" : '';
4123     
4124             $unicode = $this->utf8toCodePointsArray($text);
4125             foreach ($unicode as $c) {
4126                 if ($c === 0xFFFD) {
4127                     $out .= "\xFF\xFD"; // replacement character
4128                 } elseif ($c < 0x10000) {
4129                     $out .= chr($c >> 0x08) . chr($c & 0xFF);
4130                 } else {
4131                     $c -= 0x10000;
4132                     $w1 = 0xD800 | ($c >> 0x10);
4133                     $w2 = 0xDC00 | ($c & 0x3FF);
4134                     $out .= chr($w1 >> 0x08) . chr($w1 & 0xFF) . chr($w2 >> 0x08) . chr($w2 & 0xFF);
4135                 }
4136             }
4137     
4138             return $out;
4139         }
4140     
4141         /**
4142          * given a start position and information about how text is to be laid out, calculate where
4143          * on the page the text will end
4144          *
4145          * @param $x
4146          * @param $y
4147          * @param $angle
4148          * @param $size
4149          * @param $wa
4150          * @param $text
4151          * @return array
4152          */
4153         private function getTextPosition($x, $y, $angle, $size, $wa, $text)
4154         {
4155             // given this information return an array containing x and y for the end position as elements 0 and 1
4156             $w = $this->getTextWidth($size, $text);
4157     
4158             // need to adjust for the number of spaces in this text
4159             $words = explode(' ', $text);
4160             $nspaces = count($words) - 1;
4161             $w += $wa * $nspaces;
4162             $a = deg2rad((float)$angle);
4163     
4164             return [cos($a) * $w + $x, -sin($a) * $w + $y];
4165         }

4167         /**
4168          * Callback method used by smallCaps
4169          *
4170          * @param array $matches
4171          *
4172          * @return string
4173          */
4174         function toUpper($matches)
4175         {
4176             return mb_strtoupper($matches[0]);
4177         }
4178     
4179         function concatMatches($matches)
4180         {
4181             $str = "";
4182             foreach ($matches as $match) {
4183                 $str .= $match[0];
4184             }
4185     
4186             return $str;
4187         }

4189         /**
4190          * register text for font subsetting
4191          *
4192          * @param $font
4193          * @param $text
4194          */
4195         function registerText($font, $text)
4196         {
4197             if (!$this->isUnicode || in_array(mb_strtolower(basename($font)), self::$coreFonts)) {
4198                 return;
4199             }
4200     
4201             if (!isset($this->stringSubsets[$font])) {
4202                 $this->stringSubsets[$font] = [];
4203             }
4204     
4205             $this->stringSubsets[$font] = array_unique(
4206                 array_merge($this->stringSubsets[$font], $this->utf8toCodePointsArray($text))
4207             );
4208         }
