4210         /**
4211          * add text to the document, at a specified location, size and angle on the page
4212          *
4213          * @param $x
4214          * @param $y
4215          * @param $size
4216          * @param $text
4217          * @param int $angle
4218          * @param int $wordSpaceAdjust
4219          * @param int $charSpaceAdjust
4220          * @param bool $smallCaps
4221          */
4222         function addText($x, $y, $size, $text, $angle = 0, $wordSpaceAdjust = 0, $charSpaceAdjust = 0, $smallCaps = false)
4223         {
4224             if (!$this->numFonts) {
4225                 $this->selectFont($this->defaultFont);
4226             }
4227     
4228             $text = str_replace(["\r", "\n"], "", $text);
4229     
4230             if ($smallCaps) {
4231                 preg_match_all("/(\P{Ll}+)/u", $text, $matches, PREG_SET_ORDER);
4232                 $lower = $this->concatMatches($matches);
4233                 d($lower);
4234     
4235                 preg_match_all("/(\p{Ll}+)/u", $text, $matches, PREG_SET_ORDER);
4236                 $other = $this->concatMatches($matches);
4237                 d($other);
4238     
4239                 //$text = preg_replace_callback("/\p{Ll}/u", array($this, "toUpper"), $text);
4240             }
4241     
4242             // if there are any open callbacks, then they should be called, to show the start of the line
4243             if ($this->nCallback > 0) {
4244                 for ($i = $this->nCallback; $i > 0; $i--) {
4245                     // call each function
4246                     $info = [
4247                         'x'         => $x,
4248                         'y'         => $y,
4249                         'angle'     => $angle,
4250                         'status'    => 'sol',
4251                         'p'         => $this->callback[$i]['p'],
4252                         'nCallback' => $this->callback[$i]['nCallback'],
4253                         'height'    => $this->callback[$i]['height'],
4254                         'descender' => $this->callback[$i]['descender']
4255                     ];
4256     
4257                     $func = $this->callback[$i]['f'];
4258                     $this->$func($info);
4259                 }
4260             }
4261     
4262             if ($angle == 0) {
4263                 $this->addContent(sprintf("\nBT %.3F %.3F Td", $x, $y));
4264             } else {
4265                 $a = deg2rad((float)$angle);
4266                 $this->addContent(
4267                     sprintf("\nBT %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F Tm", cos($a), -sin($a), sin($a), cos($a), $x, $y)
4268                 );
4269             }
4270     
4271             if ($wordSpaceAdjust != 0) {
4272                 $this->addContent(sprintf(" %.3F Tw", $wordSpaceAdjust));
4273             }
4274     
4275             if ($charSpaceAdjust != 0) {
4276                 $this->addContent(sprintf(" %.3F Tc", $charSpaceAdjust));
4277             }
4278     
4279             $len = mb_strlen($text);
4280             $start = 0;
4281     
4282             if ($start < $len) {
4283                 $part = $text; // OAR - Don't need this anymore, given that $start always equals zero.  substr($text, $start);
4284                 $place_text = $this->filterText($part, false);
4285                 // modify unicode text so that extra word spacing is manually implemented (bug #)
4286                 $cf = $this->currentFont;
4287                 if ($this->fonts[$cf]['isUnicode'] && $wordSpaceAdjust != 0) {
4288                     $space_scale = 1000 / $size;
4289                     $place_text = str_replace("\x00\x20", "\x00\x20)\x00\x20" . (-round($space_scale * $wordSpaceAdjust)) . "\x00\x20(", $place_text);
4290                 }
4291                 $this->addContent(" /F$this->currentFontNum " . sprintf('%.1F Tf ', $size));
4292                 $this->addContent(" [($place_text)] TJ");
4293             }
4294     
4295             if ($wordSpaceAdjust != 0) {
4296                 $this->addContent(sprintf(" %.3F Tw", 0));
4297             }
4298     
4299             if ($charSpaceAdjust != 0) {
4300                 $this->addContent(sprintf(" %.3F Tc", 0));
4301             }
4302     
4303             $this->addContent(' ET');
4304     
4305             // if there are any open callbacks, then they should be called, to show the end of the line
4306             if ($this->nCallback > 0) {
4307                 for ($i = $this->nCallback; $i > 0; $i--) {
4308                     // call each function
4309                     $tmp = $this->getTextPosition($x, $y, $angle, $size, $wordSpaceAdjust, $text);
4310                     $info = [
4311                         'x'         => $tmp[0],
4312                         'y'         => $tmp[1],
4313                         'angle'     => $angle,
4314                         'status'    => 'eol',
4315                         'p'         => $this->callback[$i]['p'],
4316                         'nCallback' => $this->callback[$i]['nCallback'],
4317                         'height'    => $this->callback[$i]['height'],
4318                         'descender' => $this->callback[$i]['descender']
4319                     ];
4320                     $func = $this->callback[$i]['f'];
4321                     $this->$func($info);
4322                 }
4323             }
4324         }
4325     
4326         /**
4327          * calculate how wide a given text string will be on a page, at a given size.
4328          * this can be called externally, but is also used by the other class functions
4329          *
4330          * @param $size
4331          * @param $text
4332          * @param int $word_spacing
4333          * @param int $char_spacing
4334          * @return float|int
4335          */
4336         function getTextWidth($size, $text, $word_spacing = 0, $char_spacing = 0)
4337         {
4338             static $ord_cache = [];
4339     
4340             // this function should not change any of the settings, though it will need to
4341             // track any directives which change during calculation, so copy them at the start
4342             // and put them back at the end.
4343             $store_currentTextState = $this->currentTextState;
4344     
4345             if (!$this->numFonts) {
4346                 $this->selectFont($this->defaultFont);
4347             }
4348     
4349             $text = str_replace(["\r", "\n"], "", $text);
4350     
4351             // converts a number or a float to a string so it can get the width
4352             $text = "$text";
4353     
4354             // hmm, this is where it all starts to get tricky - use the font information to
4355             // calculate the width of each character, add them up and convert to user units
4356             $w = 0;
4357             $cf = $this->currentFont;
4358             $current_font = $this->fonts[$cf];
4359             $space_scale = 1000 / ($size > 0 ? $size : 1);
4360             $n_spaces = 0;
4361     
4362             if ($current_font['isUnicode']) {
4363                 // for Unicode, use the code points array to calculate width rather
4364                 // than just the string itself
4365                 $unicode = $this->utf8toCodePointsArray($text);
4366     
4367                 foreach ($unicode as $char) {
4368                     // check if we have to replace character
4369                     if (isset($current_font['differences'][$char])) {
4370                         $char = $current_font['differences'][$char];
4371                     }
4372     
4373                     if (isset($current_font['C'][$char])) {
4374                         $char_width = $current_font['C'][$char];
4375     
4376                         // add the character width
4377                         $w += $char_width;
4378     
4379                         // add additional padding for space
4380                         if (isset($current_font['codeToName'][$char]) && $current_font['codeToName'][$char] === 'space') {  // Space
4381                             $w += $word_spacing * $space_scale;
4382                             $n_spaces++;
4383                         }
4384                     }
4385                 }
4386     
4387                 // add additional char spacing
4388                 if ($char_spacing != 0) {
4389                     $w += $char_spacing * $space_scale * (count($unicode) + $n_spaces);
4390                 }
4391     
4392             } else {
4393                 // If CPDF is in Unicode mode but the current font does not support Unicode we need to convert the character set to Windows-1252
4394                 if ($this->isUnicode) {
4395                     $text = mb_convert_encoding($text, 'Windows-1252', 'UTF-8');
4396                 }
4397     
4398                 $len = mb_strlen($text, 'Windows-1252');
4399     
4400                 for ($i = 0; $i < $len; $i++) {
4401                     $c = $text[$i];
4402                     $char = isset($ord_cache[$c]) ? $ord_cache[$c] : ($ord_cache[$c] = ord($c));
4403     
4404                     // check if we have to replace character
4405                     if (isset($current_font['differences'][$char])) {
4406                         $char = $current_font['differences'][$char];
4407                     }
4408     
4409                     if (isset($current_font['C'][$char])) {
4410                         $char_width = $current_font['C'][$char];
4411     
4412                         // add the character width
4413                         $w += $char_width;
4414     
4415                         // add additional padding for space
4416                         if (isset($current_font['codeToName'][$char]) && $current_font['codeToName'][$char] === 'space') {  // Space
4417                             $w += $word_spacing * $space_scale;
4418                             $n_spaces++;
4419                         }
4420                     }
4421                 }
4422     
4423                 // add additional char spacing
4424                 if ($char_spacing != 0) {
4425                     $w += $char_spacing * $space_scale * ($len + $n_spaces);
4426                 }
4427             }
4428     
4429             $this->currentTextState = $store_currentTextState;
4430             $this->setCurrentFont();
4431     
4432             return $w * $size / 1000;
4433         }
4434     
4435         /**
4436          * this will be called at a new page to return the state to what it was on the
4437          * end of the previous page, before the stack was closed down
4438          * This is to get around not being able to have open 'q' across pages
4439          *
4440          * @param int $pageEnd
4441          */
4442         function saveState($pageEnd = 0)
4443         {
4444             if ($pageEnd) {
4445                 // this will be called at a new page to return the state to what it was on the
4446                 // end of the previous page, before the stack was closed down
4447                 // This is to get around not being able to have open 'q' across pages
4448                 $opt = $this->stateStack[$pageEnd];
4449                 // ok to use this as stack starts numbering at 1
4450                 $this->setColor($opt['col'], true);
4451                 $this->setStrokeColor($opt['str'], true);
4452                 $this->addContent("\n" . $opt['lin']);
4453                 //    $this->currentLineStyle = $opt['lin'];
4454             } else {
4455                 $this->nStateStack++;
4456                 $this->stateStack[$this->nStateStack] = [
4457                     'col' => $this->currentColor,
4458                     'str' => $this->currentStrokeColor,
4459                     'lin' => $this->currentLineStyle
4460                 ];
4461             }
4462     
4463             $this->save();
4464         }
4465     
4466         /**
4467          * restore a previously saved state
4468          *
4469          * @param int $pageEnd
4470          */
4471         function restoreState($pageEnd = 0)
4472         {
4473             if (!$pageEnd) {
4474                 $n = $this->nStateStack;
4475                 $this->currentColor = $this->stateStack[$n]['col'];
4476                 $this->currentStrokeColor = $this->stateStack[$n]['str'];
4477                 $this->addContent("\n" . $this->stateStack[$n]['lin']);
4478                 $this->currentLineStyle = $this->stateStack[$n]['lin'];
4479                 $this->stateStack[$n] = null;
4480                 unset($this->stateStack[$n]);
4481                 $this->nStateStack--;
4482             }
4483     
4484             $this->restore();
4485         }

4487         /**
4488          * make a loose object, the output will go into this object, until it is closed, then will revert to
4489          * the current one.
4490          * this object will not appear until it is included within a page.
4491          * the function will return the object number
4492          *
4493          * @return int
4494          */
4495         function openObject()
4496         {
4497             $this->nStack++;
4498             $this->stack[$this->nStack] = ['c' => $this->currentContents, 'p' => $this->currentPage];
4499             // add a new object of the content type, to hold the data flow
4500             $this->numObj++;
4501             $this->o_contents($this->numObj, 'new');
4502             $this->currentContents = $this->numObj;
4503             $this->looseObjects[$this->numObj] = 1;
4504     
4505             return $this->numObj;
4506         }
4507     
4508         /**
4509          * open an existing object for editing
4510          *
4511          * @param $id
4512          */
4513         function reopenObject($id)
4514         {
4515             $this->nStack++;
4516             $this->stack[$this->nStack] = ['c' => $this->currentContents, 'p' => $this->currentPage];
4517             $this->currentContents = $id;
4518     
4519             // also if this object is the primary contents for a page, then set the current page to its parent
4520             if (isset($this->objects[$id]['onPage'])) {
4521                 $this->currentPage = $this->objects[$id]['onPage'];
4522             }
4523         }
4524     
4525         /**
4526          * close an object
4527          */
4528         function closeObject()
4529         {
4530             // close the object, as long as there was one open in the first place, which will be indicated by
4531             // an objectId on the stack.
4532             if ($this->nStack > 0) {
4533                 $this->currentContents = $this->stack[$this->nStack]['c'];
4534                 $this->currentPage = $this->stack[$this->nStack]['p'];
4535                 $this->nStack--;
4536                 // easier to probably not worry about removing the old entries, they will be overwritten
4537                 // if there are new ones.
4538             }
4539         }
4540     
4541         /**
4542          * stop an object from appearing on pages from this point on
4543          *
4544          * @param $id
4545          */
4546         function stopObject($id)
4547         {
4548             // if an object has been appearing on pages up to now, then stop it, this page will
4549             // be the last one that could contain it.
4550             if (isset($this->addLooseObjects[$id])) {
4551                 $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = '';
4552             }
4553         }
4554     
4555         /**
4556          * after an object has been created, it wil only show if it has been added, using this function.
4557          *
4558          * @param $id
4559          * @param string $options
4560          */
4561         function addObject($id, $options = 'add')
4562         {
4563             // add the specified object to the page
4564             if (isset($this->looseObjects[$id]) && $this->currentContents != $id) {
4565                 // then it is a valid object, and it is not being added to itself
4566                 switch ($options) {
4567                     case 'all':
4568                         // then this object is to be added to this page (done in the next block) and
4569                         // all future new pages.
4570                         $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = 'all';
4571     
4572                     case 'add':
4573                         if (isset($this->objects[$this->currentContents]['onPage'])) {
4574                             // then the destination contents is the primary for the page
4575                             // (though this object is actually added to that page)
4576                             $this->o_page($this->objects[$this->currentContents]['onPage'], 'content', $id);
4577                         }
4578                         break;
4579     
4580                     case 'even':
4581                         $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = 'even';
4582                         $pageObjectId = $this->objects[$this->currentContents]['onPage'];
4583                         if ($this->objects[$pageObjectId]['info']['pageNum'] % 2 == 0) {
4584                             $this->addObject($id);
4585                             // hacky huh :)
4586                         }
4587                         break;
4588     
4589                     case 'odd':
4590                         $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = 'odd';
4591                         $pageObjectId = $this->objects[$this->currentContents]['onPage'];
4592                         if ($this->objects[$pageObjectId]['info']['pageNum'] % 2 == 1) {
4593                             $this->addObject($id);
4594                             // hacky huh :)
4595                         }
4596                         break;
4597     
4598                     case 'next':
4599                         $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = 'all';
4600                         break;
4601     
4602                     case 'nexteven':
4603                         $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = 'even';
4604                         break;
4605     
4606                     case 'nextodd':
4607                         $this->addLooseObjects[$id] = 'odd';
4608                         break;
4609                 }
4610             }
4611         }

4613         /**
4614          * return a storable representation of a specific object
4615          *
4616          * @param $id
4617          * @return string|null
4618          */
4619         function serializeObject($id)
4620         {
4621             if (array_key_exists($id, $this->objects)) {
4622                 return serialize($this->objects[$id]);
4623             }
4624     
4625             return null;
4626         }

4628         /**
4629          * restore an object from its stored representation.  returns its new object id.
4630          *
4631          * @param $obj
4632          * @return int
4633          */
4634         function restoreSerializedObject($obj)
4635         {
4636             $obj_id = $this->openObject();
4637             $this->objects[$obj_id] = unserialize($obj);
4638             $this->closeObject();
4639     
4640             return $obj_id;
4641         }

4643         /**
4644          * add content to the documents info object
4645          *
4646          * @param $label
4647          * @param int $value
4648          */
4649         function addInfo($label, $value = 0)
4650         {
4651             // this will only work if the label is one of the valid ones.
4652             // modify this so that arrays can be passed as well.
4653             // if $label is an array then assume that it is key => value pairs
4654             // else assume that they are both scalar, anything else will probably error
4655             if (is_array($label)) {
4656                 foreach ($label as $l => $v) {
4657                     $this->o_info($this->infoObject, $l, $v);
4658                 }
4659             } else {
4660                 $this->o_info($this->infoObject, $label, $value);
4661             }
4662         }
4663     
4664         /**
4665          * set the viewer preferences of the document, it is up to the browser to obey these.
4666          *
4667          * @param $label
4668          * @param int $value
4669          */
4670         function setPreferences($label, $value = 0)
4671         {
4672             // this will only work if the label is one of the valid ones.
4673             if (is_array($label)) {
4674                 foreach ($label as $l => $v) {
4675                     $this->o_catalog($this->catalogId, 'viewerPreferences', [$l => $v]);
4676                 }
4677             } else {
4678                 $this->o_catalog($this->catalogId, 'viewerPreferences', [$label => $value]);
4679             }
4680         }
4681     
4682         /**
4683          * extract an integer from a position in a byte stream
4684          *
4685          * @param $data
4686          * @param $pos
4687          * @param $num
4688          * @return int
4689          */
4690         private function getBytes(&$data, $pos, $num)
4691         {
4692             // return the integer represented by $num bytes from $pos within $data
4693             $ret = 0;
4694             for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++) {
4695                 $ret *= 256;
4696                 $ret += ord($data[$pos + $i]);
4697             }
4698     
4699             return $ret;
4700         }

4702         /**
4703          * Check if image already added to pdf image directory.
4704          * If yes, need not to create again (pass empty data)
4705          *
4706          * @param $imgname
4707          * @return bool
4708          */
4709         function image_iscached($imgname)
4710         {
4711             return isset($this->imagelist[$imgname]);
4712         }

4714         /**
4715          * add a PNG image into the document, from a GD object
4716          * this should work with remote files
4717          *
4718          * @param string $file The PNG file
4719          * @param float $x X position
4720          * @param float $y Y position
4721          * @param float $w Width
4722          * @param float $h Height
4723          * @param resource $img A GD resource
4724          * @param bool $is_mask true if the image is a mask
4725          * @param bool $mask true if the image is masked
4726          * @throws Exception
4727          */
4728         function addImagePng($file, $x, $y, $w = 0.0, $h = 0.0, &$img, $is_mask = false, $mask = null)
4729         {
4730             if (!function_exists("imagepng")) {
4731                 throw new \Exception("The PHP GD extension is required, but is not installed.");
4732             }
4733     
4734             //if already cached, need not to read again
4735             if (isset($this->imagelist[$file])) {
4736                 $data = null;
4737             } else {
4738                 // Example for transparency handling on new image. Retain for current image
4739                 // $tIndex = imagecolortransparent($img);
4740                 // if ($tIndex > 0) {
4741                 //   $tColor    = imagecolorsforindex($img, $tIndex);
4742                 //   $new_tIndex    = imagecolorallocate($new_img, $tColor['red'], $tColor['green'], $tColor['blue']);
4743                 //   imagefill($new_img, 0, 0, $new_tIndex);
4744                 //   imagecolortransparent($new_img, $new_tIndex);
4745                 // }
4746                 // blending mode (literal/blending) on drawing into current image. not relevant when not saved or not drawn
4747                 //imagealphablending($img, true);
4748     
4749                 //default, but explicitely set to ensure pdf compatibility
4750                 imagesavealpha($img, false/*!$is_mask && !$mask*/);
4751     
4752                 $error = 0;
4753                 //DEBUG_IMG_TEMP
4754                 //debugpng
4755                 if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
4756                     print '[addImagePng ' . $file . ']';
4757                 }
4758     
4759                 ob_start();
4760                 @imagepng($img);
4761                 $data = ob_get_clean();
4762     
4763                 if ($data == '') {
4764                     $error = 1;
4765                     $errormsg = 'trouble writing file from GD';
4766                     //DEBUG_IMG_TEMP
4767                     //debugpng
4768                     if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
4769                         print 'trouble writing file from GD';
4770                     }
4771                 }
4772     
4773                 if ($error) {
4774                     $this->addMessage('PNG error - (' . $file . ') ' . $errormsg);
4775     
4776                     return;
4777                 }
4778             }  //End isset($this->imagelist[$file]) (png Duplicate removal)
4779     
4780             $this->addPngFromBuf($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, $data, $is_mask, $mask);
4781         }

4783         /**
4784          * @param $file
4785          * @param $x
4786          * @param $y
4787          * @param $w
4788          * @param $h
4789          * @param $byte
4790          */
4791         protected function addImagePngAlpha($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, $byte)
4792         {
4793             // generate images
4794             $img = imagecreatefrompng($file);
4795     
4796             if ($img === false) {
4797                 return;
4798             }
4799     
4800             // FIXME The pixel transformation doesn't work well with 8bit PNGs
4801             $eight_bit = ($byte & 4) !== 4;
4802     
4803             $wpx = imagesx($img);
4804             $hpx = imagesy($img);
4805     
4806             imagesavealpha($img, false);
4807     
4808             // create temp alpha file
4809             $tempfile_alpha = @tempnam($this->tmp, "cpdf_img_");
4810             @unlink($tempfile_alpha);
4811             $tempfile_alpha = "$tempfile_alpha.png";
4812     
4813             // create temp plain file
4814             $tempfile_plain = @tempnam($this->tmp, "cpdf_img_");
4815             @unlink($tempfile_plain);
4816             $tempfile_plain = "$tempfile_plain.png";
4817     
4818             $imgalpha = imagecreate($wpx, $hpx);
4819             imagesavealpha($imgalpha, false);
4820     
4821             // generate gray scale palette (0 -> 255)
4822             for ($c = 0; $c < 256; ++$c) {
4823                 imagecolorallocate($imgalpha, $c, $c, $c);
4824             }
4825     
4826             // Use PECL gmagick + Graphics Magic to process transparent PNG images
4827             if (extension_loaded("gmagick")) {
4828                 $gmagick = new \Gmagick($file);
4829                 $gmagick->setimageformat('png');
4830     
4831                 // Get opacity channel (negative of alpha channel)
4832                 $alpha_channel_neg = clone $gmagick;
4833                 $alpha_channel_neg->separateimagechannel(\Gmagick::CHANNEL_OPACITY);
4834     
4835                 // Negate opacity channel
4836                 $alpha_channel = new \Gmagick();
4837                 $alpha_channel->newimage($wpx, $hpx, "#FFFFFF", "png");
4838                 $alpha_channel->compositeimage($alpha_channel_neg, \Gmagick::COMPOSITE_DIFFERENCE, 0, 0);
4839                 $alpha_channel->separateimagechannel(\Gmagick::CHANNEL_RED);
4840                 $alpha_channel->writeimage($tempfile_alpha);
4841     
4842                 // Cast to 8bit+palette
4843                 $imgalpha_ = imagecreatefrompng($tempfile_alpha);
4844                 imagecopy($imgalpha, $imgalpha_, 0, 0, 0, 0, $wpx, $hpx);
4845                 imagedestroy($imgalpha_);
4846                 imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha);
4847     
4848                 // Make opaque image
4849                 $color_channels = new \Gmagick();
4850                 $color_channels->newimage($wpx, $hpx, "#FFFFFF", "png");
4851                 $color_channels->compositeimage($gmagick, \Gmagick::COMPOSITE_COPYRED, 0, 0);
4852                 $color_channels->compositeimage($gmagick, \Gmagick::COMPOSITE_COPYGREEN, 0, 0);
4853                 $color_channels->compositeimage($gmagick, \Gmagick::COMPOSITE_COPYBLUE, 0, 0);
4854                 $color_channels->writeimage($tempfile_plain);
4855     
4856                 $imgplain = imagecreatefrompng($tempfile_plain);
4857             }
4858             // Use PECL imagick + ImageMagic to process transparent PNG images
4859             elseif (extension_loaded("imagick")) {
4860                 // Native cloning was added to pecl-imagick in svn commit 263814
4861                 // the first version containing it was 3.0.1RC1
4862                 static $imagickClonable = null;
4863                 if ($imagickClonable === null) {
4864                     $imagickClonable = version_compare(\Imagick::IMAGICK_EXTVER, '3.0.1rc1') > 0;
4865                 }
4866     
4867                 $imagick = new \Imagick($file);
4868                 $imagick->setFormat('png');
4869     
4870                 // Get opacity channel (negative of alpha channel)
4871                 if ($imagick->getImageAlphaChannel() !== 0) {
4872                     $alpha_channel = $imagickClonable ? clone $imagick : $imagick->clone();
4873                     $alpha_channel->separateImageChannel(\Imagick::CHANNEL_ALPHA);
4874                     $alpha_channel->negateImage(true);
4875                     $alpha_channel->writeImage($tempfile_alpha);
4876     
4877                     // Cast to 8bit+palette
4878                     $imgalpha_ = imagecreatefrompng($tempfile_alpha);
4879                     imagecopy($imgalpha, $imgalpha_, 0, 0, 0, 0, $wpx, $hpx);
4880                     imagedestroy($imgalpha_);
4881                     imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha);
4882                 } else {
4883                     $tempfile_alpha = null;
4884                 }
4885     
4886                 // Make opaque image
4887                 $color_channels = new \Imagick();
4888                 $color_channels->newImage($wpx, $hpx, "#FFFFFF", "png");
4889                 $color_channels->compositeImage($imagick, \Imagick::COMPOSITE_COPYRED, 0, 0);
4890                 $color_channels->compositeImage($imagick, \Imagick::COMPOSITE_COPYGREEN, 0, 0);
4891                 $color_channels->compositeImage($imagick, \Imagick::COMPOSITE_COPYBLUE, 0, 0);
4892                 $color_channels->writeImage($tempfile_plain);
4893     
4894                 $imgplain = imagecreatefrompng($tempfile_plain);
4895             } else {
4896                 // allocated colors cache
4897                 $allocated_colors = [];
4898     
4899                 // extract alpha channel
4900                 for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $wpx; ++$xpx) {
4901                     for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $hpx; ++$ypx) {
4902                         $color = imagecolorat($img, $xpx, $ypx);
4903                         $col = imagecolorsforindex($img, $color);
4904                         $alpha = $col['alpha'];
4905     
4906                         if ($eight_bit) {
4907                             // with gamma correction
4908                             $gammacorr = 2.2;
4909                             $pixel = pow((((127 - $alpha) * 255 / 127) / 255), $gammacorr) * 255;
4910                         } else {
4911                             // without gamma correction
4912                             $pixel = (127 - $alpha) * 2;
4913     
4914                             $key = $col['red'] . $col['green'] . $col['blue'];
4915     
4916                             if (!isset($allocated_colors[$key])) {
4917                                 $pixel_img = imagecolorallocate($img, $col['red'], $col['green'], $col['blue']);
4918                                 $allocated_colors[$key] = $pixel_img;
4919                             } else {
4920                                 $pixel_img = $allocated_colors[$key];
4921                             }
4922     
4923                             imagesetpixel($img, $xpx, $ypx, $pixel_img);
4924                         }
4925     
4926                         imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, $pixel);
4927                     }
4928                 }
4929     
4930                 // extract image without alpha channel
4931                 $imgplain = imagecreatetruecolor($wpx, $hpx);
4932                 imagecopy($imgplain, $img, 0, 0, 0, 0, $wpx, $hpx);
4933                 imagedestroy($img);
4934     
4935                 imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha);
4936                 imagepng($imgplain, $tempfile_plain);
4937             }
4938     
4939             // embed mask image
4940             if ($tempfile_alpha) {
4941                 $this->addImagePng($tempfile_alpha, $x, $y, $w, $h, $imgalpha, true);
4942                 imagedestroy($imgalpha);
4943             }
4944     
4945             // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask
4946             $this->addImagePng($tempfile_plain, $x, $y, $w, $h, $imgplain, false, ($tempfile_alpha !== null));
4947             imagedestroy($imgplain);
4948     
4949             // remove temp files
4950             if ($tempfile_alpha) {
4951                 unlink($tempfile_alpha);
4952             }
4953             unlink($tempfile_plain);
4954         }
4955     
4956         /**
4957          * add a PNG image into the document, from a file
4958          * this should work with remote files
4959          *
4960          * @param $file
4961          * @param $x
4962          * @param $y
4963          * @param int $w
4964          * @param int $h
4965          * @throws Exception
4966          */
4967         function addPngFromFile($file, $x, $y, $w = 0, $h = 0)
4968         {
4969             if (!function_exists("imagecreatefrompng")) {
4970                 throw new \Exception("The PHP GD extension is required, but is not installed.");
4971             }
4972     
4973             //if already cached, need not to read again
4974             if (isset($this->imagelist[$file])) {
4975                 $img = null;
4976             } else {
4977                 $info = file_get_contents($file, false, null, 24, 5);
4978                 $meta = unpack("CbitDepth/CcolorType/CcompressionMethod/CfilterMethod/CinterlaceMethod", $info);
4979                 $bit_depth = $meta["bitDepth"];
4980                 $color_type = $meta["colorType"];
4981     
4982                 // http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11IHDR
4983                 // 3 => indexed
4984                 // 4 => greyscale with alpha
4985                 // 6 => fullcolor with alpha
4986                 $is_alpha = in_array($color_type, [4, 6]) || ($color_type == 3 && $bit_depth != 4);
4987     
4988                 if ($is_alpha) { // exclude grayscale alpha
4989                     $this->addImagePngAlpha($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, $color_type);
4990                     return;
4991                 }
4992     
4993                 //png files typically contain an alpha channel.
4994                 //pdf file format or class.pdf does not support alpha blending.
4995                 //on alpha blended images, more transparent areas have a color near black.
4996                 //This appears in the result on not storing the alpha channel.
4997                 //Correct would be the box background image or its parent when transparent.
4998                 //But this would make the image dependent on the background.
4999                 //Therefore create an image with white background and copy in
5000                 //A more natural background than black is white.
5001                 //Therefore create an empty image with white background and merge the
5002                 //image in with alpha blending.
5003                 $imgtmp = @imagecreatefrompng($file);
5004                 if (!$imgtmp) {
5005                     return;
5006                 }
5007                 $sx = imagesx($imgtmp);
5008                 $sy = imagesy($imgtmp);
5009                 $img = imagecreatetruecolor($sx, $sy);
5010                 imagealphablending($img, true);
5011     
5012                 // @todo is it still needed ??
5013                 $ti = imagecolortransparent($imgtmp);
5014                 if ($ti >= 0) {
5015                     $tc = imagecolorsforindex($imgtmp, $ti);
5016                     $ti = imagecolorallocate($img, $tc['red'], $tc['green'], $tc['blue']);
5017                     imagefill($img, 0, 0, $ti);
5018                     imagecolortransparent($img, $ti);
5019                 } else {
5020                     imagefill($img, 1, 1, imagecolorallocate($img, 255, 255, 255));
5021                 }
5022     
5023                 imagecopy($img, $imgtmp, 0, 0, 0, 0, $sx, $sy);
5024                 imagedestroy($imgtmp);
5025             }
5026             $this->addImagePng($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, $img);
5027     
5028             if ($img) {
5029                 imagedestroy($img);
5030             }
5031         }
5032     
5033         /**
5034          * add a PNG image into the document, from a file
5035          * this should work with remote files
5036          *
5037          * @param $file
5038          * @param $x
5039          * @param $y
5040          * @param int $w
5041          * @param int $h
5042          */
5043         function addSvgFromFile($file, $x, $y, $w = 0, $h = 0)
5044         {
5045             $doc = new \Svg\Document();
5046             $doc->loadFile($file);
5047             $dimensions = $doc->getDimensions();
5048     
5049             $this->save();
5050     
5051             $this->transform([$w / $dimensions["width"], 0, 0, $h / $dimensions["height"], $x, $y]);
5052     
5053             $surface = new \Svg\Surface\SurfaceCpdf($doc, $this);
5054             $doc->render($surface);
5055     
5056             $this->restore();
5057         }
5058     
5059         /**
5060          * add a PNG image into the document, from a memory buffer of the file
5061          *
5062          * @param $file
5063          * @param $x
5064          * @param $y
5065          * @param float $w
5066          * @param float $h
5067          * @param $data
5068          * @param bool $is_mask
5069          * @param null $mask
5070          */
5071         function addPngFromBuf($file, $x, $y, $w = 0.0, $h = 0.0, &$data, $is_mask = false, $mask = null)
5072         {
5073             if (isset($this->imagelist[$file])) {
5074                 $data = null;
5075                 $info['width'] = $this->imagelist[$file]['w'];
5076                 $info['height'] = $this->imagelist[$file]['h'];
5077                 $label = $this->imagelist[$file]['label'];
5078             } else {
5079                 if ($data == null) {
5080                     $this->addMessage('addPngFromBuf error - data not present!');
5081     
5082                     return;
5083                 }
5084     
5085                 $error = 0;
5086     
5087                 if (!$error) {
5088                     $header = chr(137) . chr(80) . chr(78) . chr(71) . chr(13) . chr(10) . chr(26) . chr(10);
5089     
5090                     if (mb_substr($data, 0, 8, '8bit') != $header) {
5091                         $error = 1;
5092     
5093                         if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5094                             print '[addPngFromFile this file does not have a valid header ' . $file . ']';
5095                         }
5096     
5097                         $errormsg = 'this file does not have a valid header';
5098                     }
5099                 }
5100     
5101                 if (!$error) {
5102                     // set pointer
5103                     $p = 8;
5104                     $len = mb_strlen($data, '8bit');
5105     
5106                     // cycle through the file, identifying chunks
5107                     $haveHeader = 0;
5108                     $info = [];
5109                     $idata = '';
5110                     $pdata = '';
5111     
5112                     while ($p < $len) {
5113                         $chunkLen = $this->getBytes($data, $p, 4);
5114                         $chunkType = mb_substr($data, $p + 4, 4, '8bit');
5115     
5116                         switch ($chunkType) {
5117                             case 'IHDR':
5118                                 // this is where all the file information comes from
5119                                 $info['width'] = $this->getBytes($data, $p + 8, 4);
5120                                 $info['height'] = $this->getBytes($data, $p + 12, 4);
5121                                 $info['bitDepth'] = ord($data[$p + 16]);
5122                                 $info['colorType'] = ord($data[$p + 17]);
5123                                 $info['compressionMethod'] = ord($data[$p + 18]);
5124                                 $info['filterMethod'] = ord($data[$p + 19]);
5125                                 $info['interlaceMethod'] = ord($data[$p + 20]);
5126     
5127                                 //print_r($info);
5128                                 $haveHeader = 1;
5129                                 if ($info['compressionMethod'] != 0) {
5130                                     $error = 1;
5131     
5132                                     //debugpng
5133                                     if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5134                                         print '[addPngFromFile unsupported compression method ' . $file . ']';
5135                                     }
5136     
5137                                     $errormsg = 'unsupported compression method';
5138                                 }
5139     
5140                                 if ($info['filterMethod'] != 0) {
5141                                     $error = 1;
5142     
5143                                     //debugpng
5144                                     if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5145                                         print '[addPngFromFile unsupported filter method ' . $file . ']';
5146                                     }
5147     
5148                                     $errormsg = 'unsupported filter method';
5149                                 }
5150                                 break;
5151     
5152                             case 'PLTE':
5153                                 $pdata .= mb_substr($data, $p + 8, $chunkLen, '8bit');
5154                                 break;
5155     
5156                             case 'IDAT':
5157                                 $idata .= mb_substr($data, $p + 8, $chunkLen, '8bit');
5158                                 break;
5159     
5160                             case 'tRNS':
5161                                 //this chunk can only occur once and it must occur after the PLTE chunk and before IDAT chunk
5162                                 //print "tRNS found, color type = ".$info['colorType']."\n";
5163                                 $transparency = [];
5164     
5165                                 switch ($info['colorType']) {
5166                                     // indexed color, rbg
5167                                     case 3:
5168                                         /* corresponding to entries in the plte chunk
5169                                          Alpha for palette index 0: 1 byte
5170                                          Alpha for palette index 1: 1 byte
5171                                          ...etc...
5172                                         */
5173                                         // there will be one entry for each palette entry. up until the last non-opaque entry.
5174                                         // set up an array, stretching over all palette entries which will be o (opaque) or 1 (transparent)
5175                                         $transparency['type'] = 'indexed';
5176                                         $trans = 0;
5177     
5178                                         for ($i = $chunkLen; $i >= 0; $i--) {
5179                                             if (ord($data[$p + 8 + $i]) == 0) {
5180                                                 $trans = $i;
5181                                             }
5182                                         }
5183     
5184                                         $transparency['data'] = $trans;
5185                                         break;
5186     
5187                                     // grayscale
5188                                     case 0:
5189                                         /* corresponding to entries in the plte chunk
5190                                          Gray: 2 bytes, range 0 .. (2^bitdepth)-1
5191                                         */
5192                                         //            $transparency['grayscale'] = $this->PRVT_getBytes($data,$p+8,2); // g = grayscale
5193                                         $transparency['type'] = 'indexed';
5194                                         $transparency['data'] = ord($data[$p + 8 + 1]);
5195                                         break;
5196     
5197                                     // truecolor
5198                                     case 2:
5199                                         /* corresponding to entries in the plte chunk
5200                                          Red: 2 bytes, range 0 .. (2^bitdepth)-1
5201                                          Green: 2 bytes, range 0 .. (2^bitdepth)-1
5202                                          Blue: 2 bytes, range 0 .. (2^bitdepth)-1
5203                                         */
5204                                         $transparency['r'] = $this->getBytes($data, $p + 8, 2);
5205                                         // r from truecolor
5206                                         $transparency['g'] = $this->getBytes($data, $p + 10, 2);
5207                                         // g from truecolor
5208                                         $transparency['b'] = $this->getBytes($data, $p + 12, 2);
5209                                         // b from truecolor
5210     
5211                                         $transparency['type'] = 'color-key';
5212                                         break;
5213     
5214                                     //unsupported transparency type
5215                                     default:
5216                                         if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5217                                             print '[addPngFromFile unsupported transparency type ' . $file . ']';
5218                                         }
5219                                         break;
5220                                 }
5221     
5222                                 // KS End new code
5223                                 break;
5224     
5225                             default:
5226                                 break;
5227                         }
5228     
5229                         $p += $chunkLen + 12;
5230                     }
5231     
5232                     if (!$haveHeader) {
5233                         $error = 1;
5234     
5235                         //debugpng
5236                         if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5237                             print '[addPngFromFile information header is missing ' . $file . ']';
5238                         }
5239     
5240                         $errormsg = 'information header is missing';
5241                     }
5242     
5243                     if (isset($info['interlaceMethod']) && $info['interlaceMethod']) {
5244                         $error = 1;
5245     
5246                         //debugpng
5247                         if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5248                             print '[addPngFromFile no support for interlaced images in pdf ' . $file . ']';
5249                         }
5250     
5251                         $errormsg = 'There appears to be no support for interlaced images in pdf.';
5252                     }
5253                 }
5254     
5255                 if (!$error && $info['bitDepth'] > 8) {
5256                     $error = 1;
5257     
5258                     //debugpng
5259                     if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5260                         print '[addPngFromFile bit depth of 8 or less is supported ' . $file . ']';
5261                     }
5262     
5263                     $errormsg = 'only bit depth of 8 or less is supported';
5264                 }
5265     
5266                 if (!$error) {
5267                     switch ($info['colorType']) {
5268                         case 3:
5269                             $color = 'DeviceRGB';
5270                             $ncolor = 1;
5271                             break;
5272     
5273                         case 2:
5274                             $color = 'DeviceRGB';
5275                             $ncolor = 3;
5276                             break;
5277     
5278                         case 0:
5279                             $color = 'DeviceGray';
5280                             $ncolor = 1;
5281                             break;
5282     
5283                         default:
5284                             $error = 1;
5285     
5286                             //debugpng
5287                             if (defined("DEBUGPNG") && DEBUGPNG) {
5288                                 print '[addPngFromFile alpha channel not supported: ' . $info['colorType'] . ' ' . $file . ']';
5289                             }
5290     
5291                             $errormsg = 'transparency alpha channel not supported, transparency only supported for palette images.';
5292                     }
5293                 }
5294     
5295                 if ($error) {
5296                     $this->addMessage('PNG error - (' . $file . ') ' . $errormsg);
5297     
5298                     return;
5299                 }
5300     
5301                 //print_r($info);
5302                 // so this image is ok... add it in.
5303                 $this->numImages++;
5304                 $im = $this->numImages;
5305                 $label = "I$im";
5306                 $this->numObj++;
5307     
5308                 //  $this->o_image($this->numObj,'new',array('label' => $label,'data' => $idata,'iw' => $w,'ih' => $h,'type' => 'png','ic' => $info['width']));
5309                 $options = [
5310                     'label'            => $label,
5311                     'data'             => $idata,
5312                     'bitsPerComponent' => $info['bitDepth'],
5313                     'pdata'            => $pdata,
5314                     'iw'               => $info['width'],
5315                     'ih'               => $info['height'],
5316                     'type'             => 'png',
5317                     'color'            => $color,
5318                     'ncolor'           => $ncolor,
5319                     'masked'           => $mask,
5320                     'isMask'           => $is_mask
5321                 ];
5322     
5323                 if (isset($transparency)) {
5324                     $options['transparency'] = $transparency;
5325                 }
5326     
5327                 $this->o_image($this->numObj, 'new', $options);
5328                 $this->imagelist[$file] = ['label' => $label, 'w' => $info['width'], 'h' => $info['height']];
5329             }
5330     
5331             if ($is_mask) {
5332                 return;
5333             }
5334     
5335             if ($w <= 0 && $h <= 0) {
5336                 $w = $info['width'];
5337                 $h = $info['height'];
5338             }
5339     
5340             if ($w <= 0) {
5341                 $w = $h / $info['height'] * $info['width'];
5342             }
5343     
5344             if ($h <= 0) {
5345                 $h = $w * $info['height'] / $info['width'];
5346             }
5347     
5348             $this->addContent(sprintf("\nq\n%.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /%s Do\nQ", $w, $h, $x, $y, $label));
5349         }
5350     
5351         /**
5352          * add a JPEG image into the document, from a file
5353          *
5354          * @param $img
5355          * @param $x
5356          * @param $y
5357          * @param int $w
5358          * @param int $h
5359          */
5360         function addJpegFromFile($img, $x, $y, $w = 0, $h = 0)
5361         {
5362             // attempt to add a jpeg image straight from a file, using no GD commands
5363             // note that this function is unable to operate on a remote file.
5364     
5365             if (!file_exists($img)) {
5366                 return;
5367             }
5368     
5369             if ($this->image_iscached($img)) {
5370                 $data = null;
5371                 $imageWidth = $this->imagelist[$img]['w'];
5372                 $imageHeight = $this->imagelist[$img]['h'];
5373                 $channels = $this->imagelist[$img]['c'];
5374             } else {
5375                 $tmp = getimagesize($img);
5376                 $imageWidth = $tmp[0];
5377                 $imageHeight = $tmp[1];
5378     
5379                 if (isset($tmp['channels'])) {
5380                     $channels = $tmp['channels'];
5381                 } else {
5382                     $channels = 3;
5383                 }
5384     
5385                 $data = file_get_contents($img);
5386             }
5387     
5388             if ($w <= 0 && $h <= 0) {
5389                 $w = $imageWidth;
5390             }
5391     
5392             if ($w == 0) {
5393                 $w = $h / $imageHeight * $imageWidth;
5394             }
5395     
5396             if ($h == 0) {
5397                 $h = $w * $imageHeight / $imageWidth;
5398             }
5399     
5400             $this->addJpegImage_common($data, $x, $y, $w, $h, $imageWidth, $imageHeight, $channels, $img);
5401         }
5402     
5403         /**
5404          * common code used by the two JPEG adding functions
5405          * @param $data
5406          * @param $x
5407          * @param $y
5408          * @param int $w
5409          * @param int $h
5410          * @param $imageWidth
5411          * @param $imageHeight
5412          * @param int $channels
5413          * @param $imgname
5414          */
5415         private function addJpegImage_common(
5416             &$data,
5417             $x,
5418             $y,
5419             $w = 0,
5420             $h = 0,
5421             $imageWidth,
5422             $imageHeight,
5423             $channels = 3,
5424             $imgname
5425         ) {
5426             if ($this->image_iscached($imgname)) {
5427                 $label = $this->imagelist[$imgname]['label'];
5428                 //debugpng
5429                 //if (DEBUGPNG) print '[addJpegImage_common Duplicate '.$imgname.']';
5430     
5431             } else {
5432                 if ($data == null) {
5433                     $this->addMessage('addJpegImage_common error - (' . $imgname . ') data not present!');
5434     
5435                     return;
5436                 }
5437     
5438                 // note that this function is not to be called externally
5439                 // it is just the common code between the GD and the file options
5440                 $this->numImages++;
5441                 $im = $this->numImages;
5442                 $label = "I$im";
5443                 $this->numObj++;
5444     
5445                 $this->o_image(
5446                     $this->numObj,
5447                     'new',
5448                     [
5449                         'label'    => $label,
5450                         'data'     => &$data,
5451                         'iw'       => $imageWidth,
5452                         'ih'       => $imageHeight,
5453                         'channels' => $channels
5454                     ]
5455                 );
5456     
5457                 $this->imagelist[$imgname] = [
5458                     'label' => $label,
5459                     'w'     => $imageWidth,
5460                     'h'     => $imageHeight,
5461                     'c'     => $channels
5462                 ];
5463             }
5464     
5465             $this->addContent(sprintf("\nq\n%.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm /%s Do\nQ ", $w, $h, $x, $y, $label));
5466         }
5467     
5468         /**
5469          * specify where the document should open when it first starts
5470          *
5471          * @param $style
5472          * @param int $a
5473          * @param int $b
5474          * @param int $c
5475          */
5476         function openHere($style, $a = 0, $b = 0, $c = 0)
5477         {
5478             // this function will open the document at a specified page, in a specified style
5479             // the values for style, and the required parameters are:
5480             // 'XYZ'  left, top, zoom
5481             // 'Fit'
5482             // 'FitH' top
5483             // 'FitV' left
5484             // 'FitR' left,bottom,right
5485             // 'FitB'
5486             // 'FitBH' top
5487             // 'FitBV' left
5488             $this->numObj++;
5489             $this->o_destination(
5490                 $this->numObj,
5491                 'new',
5492                 ['page' => $this->currentPage, 'type' => $style, 'p1' => $a, 'p2' => $b, 'p3' => $c]
5493             );
5494             $id = $this->catalogId;
5495             $this->o_catalog($id, 'openHere', $this->numObj);
5496         }

5502          */
5503         function addJavascript($code)

5508         /**
5509          * create a labelled destination within the document
5510          *
5511          * @param $label
5512          * @param $style
5513          * @param int $a
5514          * @param int $b
5515          * @param int $c
5516          */
5517         function addDestination($label, $style, $a = 0, $b = 0, $c = 0)
5518         {
5519             // associates the given label with the destination, it is done this way so that a destination can be specified after
5520             // it has been linked to
5521             // styles are the same as the 'openHere' function
5522             $this->numObj++;
5523             $this->o_destination(
5524                 $this->numObj,
5525                 'new',
5526                 ['page' => $this->currentPage, 'type' => $style, 'p1' => $a, 'p2' => $b, 'p3' => $c]
5527             );
5528             $id = $this->numObj;
5529     
5530             // store the label->idf relationship, note that this means that labels can be used only once
5531             $this->destinations["$label"] = $id;
5532         }

5534         /**
5535          * define font families, this is used to initialize the font families for the default fonts
5536          * and for the user to add new ones for their fonts. The default bahavious can be overridden should
5537          * that be desired.
5538          *
5539          * @param $family
5540          * @param string $options
5541          */
5542         function setFontFamily($family, $options = '')
5543         {
5544             if (!is_array($options)) {
5545                 if ($family === 'init') {
5546                     // set the known family groups
5547                     // these font families will be used to enable bold and italic markers to be included
5548                     // within text streams. html forms will be used... <b></b> <i></i>
5549                     $this->fontFamilies['Helvetica.afm'] =
5550                         [
5551                             'b'  => 'Helvetica-Bold.afm',
5552                             'i'  => 'Helvetica-Oblique.afm',
5553                             'bi' => 'Helvetica-BoldOblique.afm',
5554                             'ib' => 'Helvetica-BoldOblique.afm'
5555                         ];
5556     
5557                     $this->fontFamilies['Courier.afm'] =
5558                         [
5559                             'b'  => 'Courier-Bold.afm',
5560                             'i'  => 'Courier-Oblique.afm',
5561                             'bi' => 'Courier-BoldOblique.afm',
5562                             'ib' => 'Courier-BoldOblique.afm'
5563                         ];
5564     
5565                     $this->fontFamilies['Times-Roman.afm'] =
5566                         [
5567                             'b'  => 'Times-Bold.afm',
5568                             'i'  => 'Times-Italic.afm',
5569                             'bi' => 'Times-BoldItalic.afm',
5570                             'ib' => 'Times-BoldItalic.afm'
5571                         ];
5572                 }
5573             } else {
5574     
5575                 // the user is trying to set a font family
5576                 // note that this can also be used to set the base ones to something else
5577                 if (mb_strlen($family)) {
5578                     $this->fontFamilies[$family] = $options;
5579                 }
5580             }
5581         }

5593         /**
5594          * a few functions which should allow the document to be treated transactionally.
5595          *
5596          * @param $action
5597          */
5598         function transaction($action)
5599         {
5600             switch ($action) {
5601                 case 'start':
5602                     // store all the data away into the checkpoint variable
5603                     $data = get_object_vars($this);
5604                     $this->checkpoint = $data;
5605                     unset($data);
5606                     break;
5607     
5608                 case 'commit':
5609                     if (is_array($this->checkpoint) && isset($this->checkpoint['checkpoint'])) {
5610                         $tmp = $this->checkpoint['checkpoint'];
5611                         $this->checkpoint = $tmp;
5612                         unset($tmp);
5613                     } else {
5614                         $this->checkpoint = '';
5615                     }
5616                     break;
5617     
5618                 case 'rewind':
5619                     // do not destroy the current checkpoint, but move us back to the state then, so that we can try again
5620                     if (is_array($this->checkpoint)) {
5621                         // can only abort if were inside a checkpoint
5622                         $tmp = $this->checkpoint;
5623     
5624                         foreach ($tmp as $k => $v) {
5625                             if ($k !== 'checkpoint') {
5626                                 $this->$k = $v;
5627                             }
5628                         }
5629                         unset($tmp);
5630                     }
5631                     break;
5632     
5633                 case 'abort':
5634                     if (is_array($this->checkpoint)) {
5635                         // can only abort if were inside a checkpoint
5636                         $tmp = $this->checkpoint;
5637                         foreach ($tmp as $k => $v) {
5638                             $this->$k = $v;
5639                         }
5640                         unset($tmp);
5641                     }
5642                     break;
5643             }
5644         }
5645     }
